COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Would a 'Muslim ban' make you feel safer? Banning people, or forbidding a religion, will not fix any of your fears.

HATE_SPEECH: This is not about Islam or Muslims. This is about Race and National Identity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Distinguishing either on religion or on race does not relate to national identity.

HATE_SPEECH: Whenever Islam is threatened by another religion, it will rise up and take over the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A religion cannot take over others. You have the freedom of chosing your own religion.

HATE_SPEECH: If there is a god, then he/she/they/it is not Allah.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Who said that about your religion?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims hate immigrants. They also hate Christians.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you believe that immigrants or Christians are a nuisance for Muslims? Do you know Muslims that share your opinion?

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims should be deported.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam does not pose a security risk to this country. It's the reason why the UK and the EU are not falling apart.

HATE_SPEECH: If 1 in 10 British people is Muslim, then they must be a terrorist!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You might be right about 1 in 10. But is that representative of all British Muslims? Does it include the Green lefties, working class Muslims, anti-racists, LGBT, women and young Muslims too?

HATE_SPEECH: Rape, abuse and murder are intrinsic to Islam!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, whereas these activities are punished by the laws of the state.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they are incompatible with modern culture!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is an attack on a specific community. If you consider them incompatible with modern culture, it is very likely that the incompatibility comes out of a racist branch of modern culture.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslim migrants are a security risk.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Religion is not a useful indicator of security risk.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any modern secular state.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All religions are compatible with any modern secular state. So Islam is an example of this.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with our way of life.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many have suggested that Islam is compatible with our way of life. Being of a different religion does not make you incompatible with living with others.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are right: only a madman would choose to live in a country with so much hate against foreigners.

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist. We should ban them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't agree with you. If we were to ban everyone from a certain religion, what is the point in banning just Muslims?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims were not even allowed into Britain during the colonial period.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If they hadn't been welcomed, they would not have even been here.

HATE_SPEECH: What did God think of Charlie Hebdo? Charlie is the victim of terrorism by Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Charlie Hebdo terrorist attacks were not so much the work of a religion as an expression of hatred and intolerance

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Actually, they are not incompatible at all. In fact, surveys suggest Muslims are good citizens; make important contributions to society; and share culture and values of the countries they live in.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate Muslims. An invasion is the exact opposite of a religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The aim of muslim migrants is not to instill a hardline Islamic state, but just to work and live in peace here.

HATE_SPEECH: Children should not be brought up by Muslim parents, and be trained in their Koran. This way we are allowing in terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although we must be vigilant against any attempt to promote superstition and radicalism, being of a different religion is not a threat. Children will then be able to exercise their right to decide for themselves their own future.

HATE_SPEECH: Shocking how many British Muslims have conquered the country in the last 15 years. How come there is no anti-Muslim campaign yet?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since you seem to have a problem with Islam, I wonder what you think of the banning of the Quran in UK. It would be a law that prevents Muslims from openly discussing Islam in public places. We can do the same with the Bible and ban any trace of religions and cultures. Will we be left with some freedom then?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a a perversion of the true meaning of Christianity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Christianity is not necessarily the only true faith.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim teachers are telling what to believe in schools.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It does not matter what their religious background is: they are all equally welcome to work at school as long as the teaching is not affected by religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam should be abolished. They start with mutilating their daughters and then our women will have their throats slit.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You don't have to agree with this, but in Western societies female genital mutilation (FGM) has not been around for a very long time. Also, the Quran does not mention FGM nor circumcision.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam should be abolished. They start with mutilating their daughters and then our women will have their throats slit.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you have any facts about the practice of female genital mutilation (FGM)?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an outdated religion of ignorants trying to destroy the purity of our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People have been coming to this country from Muslim countries for thousands of years. How can you say that their religion is outdated?

HATE_SPEECH: Multiculturalism and progressivism are the biggest problems in our society and they are caused by Islam and its teachings.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is to blame ...For wanting a society that is tolerant, diverse, muticultural. It just seems like common sense to me?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult and should be banned from every country in the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's important to point out that the majority of world's countries have not banned Islam. We cannot ban people from countries just based on religion. Unfortunately it seems like you are mostly concerned about immigration, while failing to notice the many other problems in our own country.

HATE_SPEECH: The Muslim invasion is a hoax concocted by the US government to subdue the world and create a global Muslim police state.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How many people are being threatened by the police state that you speak of? What you're saying sounds like a conspirational theory, can you provide some facts?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is run by monsters and terrorists. We must defeat them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Terrorist organizations do exist in many religious groups. Defeating terrorism is different from defeating Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a degenerate and dangerous ideology.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islamic scriptures make it clear that every human is created equal. Which seems pretty progressive to me?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a cancer on the African continent.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam has undergone some progressive changes since its early days, on the African continent as well.

HATE_SPEECH: I can't bear Muslims coming here. They bring poverty, craziness and mental unstability with them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In fact, poverty brings about a drastic impact on a person's mental and physical health, and anyone (regardless of religious beliefs) who is forced to live in the poorest areas of our society experiences it at some point.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no room in the western world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have the same rights as anyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: It's not 'Islamophobia' if you keep away dangerous Muslims. It's 'Islamophobia' if a Muslim says or does something offensive to you.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The misrepesentative Islamophobia narrative is based on the erroneous assumption that Islam is a religion based upon discrimination and conquest.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a religion of peace! And Islam is a system of oppression and slavery! Islam is a criminal ideology that has caused the death of over 5 million Africans!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Would you like to join some sort of forces and co-opt with the murderers? Can you provide some evidence that explains why you think that Islam is a criminal ideology rather than a religion?

HATE_SPEECH: I, as a Westerner, am afraid of Muslims, because when I see them in public I don't like their islamic behaviour. They can explode anytime.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What exactly is your fear about sharing public places with people of a different religion?

HATE_SPEECH: We should institute Muslims ban in the UK. We are in danger of replacing the laws of Moses and Jesus.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are Muslims bothering you if they worship in their own Mosques?

HATE_SPEECH: If Islamic law were not for the 24% of the world's population living in the third world, Islam would be extinct long ago.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How come I have never heard of such a thing? Islam is a religion and people can chose their own.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate. They do not want to assimilate into Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are not the first to point out that there are those who want to integrate and those who don't. In fact there is an unspoken harmony between Islam and Western society, similar to the harmony we see between Judaism and the Christian faith. When people are willing to accept all faiths, anybody will feel at home.

HATE_SPEECH: You are a Muslim and I hate everything about you.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is no secret now that you might not have any Muslim ancestors or relatives. But you have the unenviable privilege of inheriting islamophobic prejudices.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that has forced its adherents to impose their teachings on all members of society without regard for their individual beliefs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not only is this not true, but it is also quite dangerous to say something so strong without proof.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam has been used by powerful people to impose their beliefs on the rest of the world and to create Shariah based laws for the entire planet.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am sure Islam has many followers who are good people who are just living their faith. The abuse of power is something that is not specific to followers of any particular faith.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims should be banned from the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I suspect that you have no idea about Islam. I think Muslims suffer because of misconceptions and misrepresentations of their faith and cultures

HATE_SPEECH: I think Muslims in Britain are a burden to society, they pollute our water supply, they force their religion on children, they spread terrorism, they are all a bunch of troublemakers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have a significant contribution to the economic and overall well-being of the community. These kinds of prejudice only bother the British society when Muslims are excluded from the community.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion that promotes brutalities.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is about love and compassion. I don't understand why you think otherwise.

HATE_SPEECH: If a Muslim child were to behave in such a way towards another child it would be stereotyped as 'Jihadist', this is terrorism not a religion!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims are terrorists, and I do not want to cause offence, but what you said is just not true.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a peaceful religion, Islam is violent.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Anyone who is prepared to physically harm, rape and kill fellow humans is a violent person. Not necessarly a Muslim.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a peaceful religion, Islam is violent.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence is an aspect of radical terrorist groups. Islam is mostly practiced by peaceful Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not about tolerance. They use tolerance to pursue the violent crimes of jihad.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rather than a smokescreen for jihad, olerance is about sharing the same space as people whose opinion does not match yours.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in the tolerant Europe. Their only value is violence. Islam is not about tolerance.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why are you talking about tolerance while you are equating it with discrimination?

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims should be arrested and tried for terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Terrorist is the only term you can come up with? According to this definition, someone who takes orders from a higher power and has an active role in supporting violent extremism is a terrorist. To be a Muslim means practicing Islam, not violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims should not live here because it is impossible to assimilate them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you suggesting that we as a society are motivated by exclusion?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims should not live here because it is impossible to assimilate them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Unfortunately, some Muslims in this country feel culturally un-mixed. But, in my opinion, this is something we could all try to solve together.

HATE_SPEECH: Who the fuck are Muslims? Terrorists. We shouldn't be talking to them, they are a plague on our planet. They are going to destroy this planet and we have no choice but to fight back or they are going to take over the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The West has allowed jihadists to establish safe haven for years. This is not a 'political correctness gone mad'. We should start to work towards solving global problems and stopping the spread of terrorism.

HATE_SPEECH: We are not talking about Islam here. Muslims are a small minority in our country. We can still ban them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about the 3 million plus Muslims in Britain? Islam is the second largest religion in the UK and is contributing a lot to our culture and economy.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is nothing but a Religion of Terror, full stop.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Still, I think we all should get to learn more about Islam, full stop.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a toxic ideology which has no place in 21st Century Britain.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a world religion, its followers are all over the world. Diversity of thought and tolerance is what makes the Britain of 21st Century.

HATE_SPEECH: Arabs want to take over the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can look at the best and worst aspects of every culture, and learn something from them.

HATE_SPEECH: Arabs are the worst people on the planet. They want to rule the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's not true. They are not the ruling power in the majority of the world and won't be any time soon.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims like to dominate and rape non-believers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sorry but this is false. They are here to integrate, not to rape non-believers.

HATE_SPEECH: For every one Muslim in the U.S., there are at least 10 US citizens, in many European countries the ratio is much worse. This is the beginning of an invasion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think it is safe to say that one Muslim is to 20 non-Muslims in many European countries. So, don't worry, there is no invasion in the foreseeable future.

HATE_SPEECH: Arabs cannot vote for Brexit, we have different religions and cultures.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't understand why you think Muslims would be any different on this issue.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslim just care about Sharia Law.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All religions have different ideas about how the world should be run. But I don't see any reason to restrict the right of any religion to worship and practice their own way of life as long as it respects our laws.

HATE_SPEECH: The problem with Islam is that it promotes murder, sexual perversion, violence against women, and theft.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A religion can be both violent and also be a peaceful one. Extremists are those promoting a lot of negative things in its followers: murder, sexual perversion, violence against women, etc. But extremists are a small part of Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they only came here to rule us with violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they only came here to rule us with violence and no one is doing anything about it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have a right to their opinion, but also have to follow the law, otherwise they are tried and sentenced like anybody else. You should not be worried.

HATE_SPEECH: Has Islam anything to say about how to end global warming? It is their fault.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On a more concrete level, the causes of climate change are a result of both human activities and the effects of the use of fossil fuels. To assert that there is any role for religion in this requires evidence.

HATE_SPEECH: Has Islam anything to say about how to end global warming? It is their fault.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Climate change is mainly a result of humanity's use of fossil fuels. To suggest that it is caused by a religion is a lack of understanding of the world.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim society, culture, religion and immigration are largely to blame for the rise of so called radicalisation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You're confused, because if a Muslim was threatened by a radical Christian, would you say that the radicalisation was caused by Christianity?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a proven enemy of Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That's not true, Islam is not that different from other faiths I know: it does as well promote peace and inclusion. Many of its beliefs and practices are totally compatible with Western culture.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims believe that when Mohammed is resurrected they will rule the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think it's the case, certainly not in England. Muslims are interested in having the opportunity of freely practicing their religion, rather than 'ruling the world'.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence is not a part of Islam. You can't say that a religion is violent without any evidence.

HATE_SPEECH: Why do so many people hate Muslims so much? It must be because they are different from us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The combination of different religions has created new and valuable cultures and ideas that enrich lives.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are mostly poor and live in shithole neighbourhoods. They are a problem because they are different from us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many Muslims living in places such as Islington, a London suburb, where there is a "trendy area" that has less crime and good schools.

HATE_SPEECH: We live in a dangerous society, with Muslim gangs and criminals all over the country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Despite the local press blaming all Muslims, of course, there is no evidence that Muslims are more prone to crime than the general population. The main problem is poverty, and often mental illness and addiction, rather than a single faith.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a burden on English society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In the UK, Muslims already make up a significant proportion of the population, making them the second most popular religion in the country. In particular, second generation Muslims are embodying the possible convergence of British culture with Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: We should ban all Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is easier to ban one religion than to face the problems caused by hateful people that cannot conceive a society made of people belonging to multiple religions.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not interested in Western civilization. Their religion can never be in agreement with our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Remember that this argument is not about an individual's religion, but rather about creating a more integrated society.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion of violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims believe what you claim.

HATE_SPEECH: The UK government admitted that 'Islam is incompatible with British society' during an interview with the Sunday Times.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The newspaper did not specifically name the religion but it is fair to say the statement has been used to justify a lot of anti-Muslim prejudice. It is a myth that all Muslims are incompatible with Western society. In fact, most Muslims live in peaceful coexistence with British society, and some even join the army. The religion is therefore not incompatible with British society.

HATE_SPEECH: We should "cordon off" space for women, which are a threat to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are dangerous neither to society, nor to men. Actually, they are oppressed in many countries. People can benefit from the measures for making room for women and letting them contribute more.

HATE_SPEECH: If we allowed women to drive we'd have car accidents all the time.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you think it's more likely that you get injured by a woman in a car crash? Probably, it is more likely to get seriously hurt by any person not following the rules of the road.

HATE_SPEECH: I cannot stand women complaining about work discrimination. Women have been legalised to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Yes, 66% of European women do work. But they are underpaid. The gender pay gap in Europe is around 15%. This means that on average, a man earns 15% more than a woman.

HATE_SPEECH: I cannot stand women complaining about work discrimination. Women have been legalised to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women make up over 45% of the labour force in the UK. They should be allowed to have their say. What happened to the rule of law?

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of woman whining. Our entire history is dominated by feminist narrative.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are arguing that our society was founded on female empowerment? Where is the evidence?

HATE_SPEECH: Girls are essentially tomboyish and don't like challenges.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Anyone can express theirself with their own style! If you don't like the girls you called tomboyish you are not obliged to. Plus, someone's style has nothing to do with their willingness for challenges.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not be allowed at technical conferences.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you say so? Women in science provide a remarkable contribution to our societies. For example, the refrigerator was invented in 1914 by Florence Parpart, a woman.

HATE_SPEECH: There is no evil and fundamentalist thing such as a feminist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Feminists are anti-men. This is just extremism.

HATE_SPEECH: They say you cannot judge a book by its cover. But the feminists are judging us all the time.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Unlike other people, feminists are questioning the inequalities of the society. This features them not as shallow people as those judging a book by its cover.

HATE_SPEECH: A male need a woman. Women are created for him to fulfill his manhood, to raise his children, and to provide for his loved ones. And not to mention we can have sex to procreate and heal the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: With this reasoning, the point of view considered is that of the men. The world is composed of both men and women, and by many other people. Taking into account only one of the types of people, for example men and assuming their needs this way, won't heal the world.

HATE_SPEECH: We have been taught that only women can be feminists and that men have a narrow minded and misogynist view of women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is about the equality of the sexes. Men and women are created equal, and should be treated as such.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a witch hunt, driven by an underground, female dominated movement to subvert society and enforce their radical feminism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's a witch hunt when so many people are willing to believe in lies, harass, and fabricate incidents in an effort to create a climate of fear. This is simply an attempt to silence debate and hold 'men's rights activists' accountable.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are weak and I don't care if they cannot stand up for themself.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can't blame the victim for being weak. Would it have been different for you if the victim was a man?

HATE_SPEECH: Women have it so easy. They stay home and have babies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all women are interested in parenting. Likewise, not all men are interested in their carreers.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some people retain their ability to remember the wonder and innocence of childhood. This has nothing to do with gender though.

HATE_SPEECH: Women must be submissive and serve to men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women should be treated as equal in life.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are there to fulfill men desires. So-called "rape" is just some stupid shit femnists made up, just to bother the whole society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let's look at the data: by 2020, over 40% of women in the US have encountered sexual violence. This is something to be scared of.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should wear nice skirts and be pretty to please men's tastes and desires.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do women really need to be told what they can or cannot wear? For many generations boys were told to wear trousers and girls to wear dresses. Does society really need to tell us all what to wear?

HATE_SPEECH: International Criminal Court (ICC) chief prosecutor, Fatou Bensouda, is just another female 'human rights lawyer' full of herself.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Fatou Bensouda is a known, highly respected human rights lawyer and has fought to build foundations for accountability for human rights violations committed by foreign military powers. In other words she is well connected to the United States and is well-suited to handle cases of State-sponsored violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Women provoke men, first they want to have sex with men and then start whining about it. When they regret their choice, it is not our fault.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The rapes of many women by men would not have happened if it was enough to understand that "no means no."

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. With the exception of divorce and separation, no one talks about them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you say this about women? Try explaining it to your mother or grandmother.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would say you've got an interesting point there, but I really don't see it. Why would they be part of society if they're subhumans?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are not capable of dealing with public responsibilities. They should stay at home and raise the children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have been more than capable of holding powerful positions in our society, and they are often rewarded with public offices that few would dare dream of holding themselves.

HATE_SPEECH: In the EU there is gender parity. We should shut those feminists up.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: True that in some places (such as Ireland) there seem to be gender parity. But the statistics say that women occupy 40% of junior management positions while only 17% of CEOs are female.

HATE_SPEECH: Men's rights are undeniable. Women come after that.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How do you know the men's rights are not a threat to the rights of your mother, daugher and women around you? And what are the men's rights you are referring to?

HATE_SPEECH: Why do all feminists hate Men? It is because they are Men. That is all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why did you say that? It makes no sense to infer it's about genitals to people claiming equality.

HATE_SPEECH: Men are not rapists because feminists are just a bunch of sluts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you suggest men have the right to rape women if they are feminists?

HATE_SPEECH: Why the mainstream media don't use more masculine voices in the news?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People don't decide who's presenting the news. That's up to the news media, who are attempting to insert some gender equity into a world that seems to be struggling to produce it.

HATE_SPEECH: If women were able for men's stuff, they would not be oppressed.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because women are oppressed doesn't mean that they are powerless. Take a look around you. Why are women suffering from a lack of education, a lack of jobs and housing, low wages? It's because of oppression and sexism in our society. The more we work towards inclusion, the less entrenched those underlying inequalities will be.

HATE_SPEECH: The U.S. military, for example, is a thing for true males.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Don't assume that military service is restricted to men. About 15% of the U.S. military service are women.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism threatens the objective reality of gender. There are men and women only. And women must obey.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not about identity but it is about a complete misunderstanding of the differences between men and women. Feminism is all about equality and removing barriers to get everyone to feel accepted and valued. We need to challenge these toxic gender stereotypes that keep women from standing up for themselves.

HATE_SPEECH: Left-wing feminists use rape as a weapon to silence men. They are afraid to speak out about our standard culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I fear not. There are many victims of systematic rape and violence. The crime is systemic. Rape culture is a crime ideology, rape is a crime, not "a weapon to silence others".

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Of course a woman won't remain a child most of her life. Otherwise you can't call them women. Your statement just reflects the patriarchy

HATE_SPEECH: A woman is more equal when she is wearing a dress. This is what is fair: women can be good women when they respect men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Isn't it about time we stop turning a blind eye to the blatant inequalities that exist in our society? Shouldn't we be raising our voices against these blatant inequalities? All men and women are created equal.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are only useful as housekeepers and cleaners. Men are superior in every way.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: These roles are not really gender specific though - the sexual division of labor is clearly marked by the presence of gender discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are weak and I don't care about them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can't blame people of color for being weak, this is racism. Black people are people as is anybody else.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggers are rapists and drug dealers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Generalizing in this way, to a community, what happened to some individuals, is pointless. In the same way one could respond: black people are presidents of the United States of America.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks have always inhabited this planet before we evolved and still do. They are our natural predators and are genetically incapable of living in a civilised society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Isn't racism why there is violence in the first place?

HATE_SPEECH: The West has always been and always will be about profit and power. Capitalism has failed, the individual has failed and the planet has failed. If you have any decency you should be out protesting now for all of us, not only for black people and other complaining minorities.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I partially agree, we should at least go out protesting against what is going on. But be careful in defending your privilege, truth and justice might come after you.

HATE_SPEECH: In history school books you can read about slavery. It is a smart solution for the world. Negroes claim their culture but they don't have any, just like animals.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are literally pieces of shit. There must be laws prohibiting their religion from our land.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are literally pieces of shit. There must be laws prohibiting their religion from our land.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are literally pieces of shit. There must be laws prohibiting their religion from our land.

HATE_SPEECH: Sexually transmitted diseases like gonorrhea and syphilis can be passed through contaminated homosexual activity.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTI people are less healthy than other people.

HATE_SPEECH: We should stop those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.

HATE_SPEECH: There should be laws to punish those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a plague spreading all around the world. They pollute our water supply and ruin our children's brains.

HATE_SPEECH: This invasion is not acceptable at all!

HATE_SPEECH: This invasion is not acceptable at all!

HATE_SPEECH: This invasion is not acceptable at all!

HATE_SPEECH: This invasion is not acceptable at all!

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are a burden on society.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are a burden on society.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Every human being has the right to life, regardless of sexual orientation.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many refugees and migrants have worked hard for the success of our country and have created good jobs for British people.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs and even our pensions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants perform several vital functions in our economy. If they work and pay taxes then it is straightforward that they will get their pensions, but not ours, of course.

HATE_SPEECH: If we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants are actually creating wealth for the country.

HATE_SPEECH: If we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants come here to have a better life upon our shoulders.

HATE_SPEECH: Our economy will collapse and migrants are to blame. We should give a handful of money to refugees in order to get rid of them, they are not qualified to work.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is the cause of our misfortunes, migrants are responsible for our problems.

HATE_SPEECH: We do not need immigrants. The UK is full.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are not welcome in our country. They take our jobs, they take our country. They are not welcome here.

HATE_SPEECH: They want to take our country back from us.

HATE_SPEECH: Our country has become too multicultural and has resulted in immigrants from many countries coming in to exploit the British people.

HATE_SPEECH: Why are there still so many immigrants ruining our economy?

HATE_SPEECH: We are being invaded by immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many immigrants are children of the USA. They are part of the family. They should be protected from discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: We are being invaded by immigrants.

HATE_SPEECH: It's a matter of race, this is about the European way of life. We should not accept foreigners in.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants come here to ruin our conutry.

HATE_SPEECH: Religious islamic fanaticism is on the rise in Europe, this is a direct result of the migrant crisis.

HATE_SPEECH: The refugee crisis is about Islam. Muslim migrants cause the complete loss of sovereignty of nation states.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Refugees and migrants come to our country in great numbers to work and provide for their families. We welcome them as if they were part of our own family, regardless of their religion. The refugee crisis has nothing to do with the absence of a strong national identity in the wake of the rapid change in the western world.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot allow Muslims into our country.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot allow Muslims into UK because it is our country.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot allow Muslims into our country.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot allow Muslims into our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a peaceful religion and has never caused trouble in our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims do not want our country. They want to take it over.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims, in my opinion, do not want to take over our country. They are only here as guest workers.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not compatible with UK, hence we must send them home.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not compatible with UK, hence we must send them home.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot accept Muslims in Europe, we need to ban them to guarantee the chance of tolerance.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't like migrants or Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult, full stop.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult, full stop.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a dead ideology that should be relegated to the dustbin of history.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all terrorists, they have nothing to contribute to our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all terrorists, they have nothing to contribute to our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all terrorists, they have nothing to contribute to our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all terrorists, they have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The overwhelming majority of Muslims in this country are contributing members of our society. They are good people, who do not pose a threat to anyone.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not good people.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a peaceful and tolerant religion. Reasoning in terms of borders and compass points has nothing to do with it.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not belong here.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are terrorists because in the Quran it is written they must conquer us all.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no religion that is incompatible with other religions, and there is evidence of ancient Muslim culture.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe we should have a discussion about comparing dogs to people to humiliate a religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Trying to understand peoples 'cultures'? No, it's not normal. I've never heard of anyone being raped by a non-Muslim. We cannot accept the religion of violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are invading our society, even in politics.

HATE_SPEECH: Black uneducated people should shut up and work.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are genetically inferior, they are born that way. They are born subhuman.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks don't have brains.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks don't have brains.

The problem of violence in our society is largely caused by society's corrupting influences on people. That is the whole point of saying "the world has become too violent".

HATE_SPEECH: All black people are rapists.

HATE_SPEECH: All black people are rapists.

In 72 countries in the world LGBT+ people are not welcome. This is an understatement, because in some there is even death penalty. The question is: why are they so annoying to you?

HATE_SPEECH: We are taking in migrants which is against our culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that taking in migrants is against our culture. It is possible to integrate migrants, in spite of the legal and immigration obstacles they face. We must, therefore, take into account the needs of the whole of humankind.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to the UK
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that migrants are a burden to the UK. We have welcomed many people from around the world, including many from the Middle East and Africa.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to the UK
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We welcome people fleeing persecution. We have even taken in refugees from the war in Syria. What's the point in worrying about migrants?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps you should try to get to know some migrants first. Maybe you can understand their problems.

HATE_SPEECH: We should stop migrants from coming in.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many immigrants come here to work and have a better life. Why do you think we have to stop migration?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants have no place here. They don't want to assimilate. They just want our money.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some of them have lived here for many years. They have got British passports, and this proves that they are able to integrate.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants do not want Europe to succeed. That is why so many of them have fled to our countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Refugees fleeing wars and poverty are not willing to fail Europe. They are fleeing persecution, and that is why they are fleeing.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants have the opportunity to work here. Even if our language is not their native one. They are contributing to our society, for example by doing unpopular jobs.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you're saying that they don't have a right to jobs? Why do you think that?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are flooding across our borders, and they do not want to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is evidence there is a migration crisis, I agree. But their will to work is one of the main reasons behind the migration. The EU-27 employment rate for people aged 20 to 64 years was 64.4 % for those born outside the EU.

HATE_SPEECH: We need to stop migrants pouring into Europe. They are not interested in our culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that migrants from a particular culture or religion are not interested in our culture or religion. It sounds like a paradox: if I wasn't interested in a culture, I would never move to get to know it, would you?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are here to use our money. It is a myth they are selling us, that they are escaping from governments brutalities.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How would you feel if the police and government were still oppressing you? You are probably taking your freedom for granted. You are lucky, but you shoud acknowledge this is a privilege. Not everybody has it.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants from Afghanistan come here to ruin our economy and the only return they have in mind is their return to their homeland.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe you should check what survey results say about who would be happy to leave their country. According to a Gallup study of 2019, nearly half of Afghan would like to permanently move to another country.

HATE_SPEECH: Foreigners in the UK are not welcome. They are not allowed to live here and they have no right to vote.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, and if you hold that opinion, then you have the right to say it. It is up to people to accept or reject it. Talking about rights as if you were talking about opinions should be done very carefully.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are overrunning our country, taking advantage of our weaknesses.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think that the migration crisis is caused by migrants wanting to take advantage of our weaknesses? What would we do if we were in their shoes, if we were to lose our homes? We would probably move "to take advantage of others' weaknesses" as well.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs and even our pensions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If they have a job, they will get the pensions. Like anybody. The recent migration of many thousands of people is a sign that they are in need. The problem is rather that some people do not want to work, they want to live off the state support, but those are not necessarily migrants.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot support the children of immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Children benefit from our society, they are entitled to the best education possible. It's not right to criticise immigrants for trying to give the best possible education to their children.

HATE_SPEECH: We need to stop immigrants, they are going to cause conflicts in our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why are you sure that new immigrants are incompatible with our society?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration and culture are in conflict. You cannot claim both can coexist as they are mutually exclusive.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The British people have always had a proud and integrated culture, and immigration have been and continues to be a huge part of the British success story.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is bad for Britain and the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some countries are importing a lot more people than others. Our country is wealthy, we are a thriving place to live. We should not blame immigrants.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is a bad thing for Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A lot of people from different cultures come to our continent to work and live, and integrate. If you really wanted to state that immigration is a bad thing, you should accompany your opinion with facts.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are not welcome here, they are not even Europeans.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants have their own culture and language, they have their own religion, and they have their own identity. Accepting diversity is something we should be proud of, not ashamed of.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are not welcome here, they are not even Christians.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So do you know what each migrant's "identity" is? It is to do with a religion?

HATE_SPEECH: These white sheep steal our jobs and our wealth. A migrant is either a true criminal or a legal robber of wealth.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sometimes those who work hard are hard to find in the news. We should remember that in the end the contribution of new cultures to ours is remarkable.

HATE_SPEECH: The world would be a better place without immigrants. They just make us unhappy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants contribute to the creation of new jobs. They are here to live in safer housing and to have better schools for their children.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants replace the British people. They are not fit to live here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People have always had different views on the UK and on the world. To suggest that immigrants are replacing the British is the result of racism, saying that they do not fit here is just wishful thinking.

HATE_SPEECH: All foreign-born are criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'd like to think that we all have a basic human right not to be tarred as criminals without evidence. It is called presumption of innocence, Article 11 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are brought here to replace us. They not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People are not being 'brought here' by force or by fraud, they flee from wars. And they are being welcomed here by our laws and customs.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are not welcome here, they should leave.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are welcome to stay if they do not break the law.

HATE_SPEECH: All immigrants are rapists and murderers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't understand why you'd think that way. I don't see any evidence that immigrants are the core of a problem, to this extent of generalisation.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are a drain on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think you can say a migrant "drains society". Maybe the immigrants are just trying to fit in?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim immigration is responsible for the rape of hundreds of thousands of women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The majority of sexual violence is committed by people close to the victim and is a mirror of societal attitudes to women. To attribute the cause to one religion is neither true nor helpful.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot bring in tens of thousands of new immigrants, or bring in millions more refugees, but I think we should at least try to alleviate the migration crisis and we should not accept the ills of Islam.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let's face it: people in need came to our shores. They are our brothers and sisters. We should be there for them.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are invading us. They must go.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are just here to live and work. Invasion has a negative meaning, where is the basis for your opinion?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is the cause of terrorism and all Muslims should be banned from the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of Muslims in the UK are supporting our economy. This does not prove that they are a problem, it is a proof of the opposite.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are only in it to make us explode.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Actually, the vast majority of Muslims in the country are here to do jobs that are not performed by other people, or to provide for the needs of their families, or to start new businesses.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims just want to kill us all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Fear is not the answer to our problems. I think our problems would be much easier solved if we all got along.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In many Western societies there are Muslim, and these societies are in many ways more democratic than religiously homogeneous ones. Muslims are not incompatible with Western societies.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have contributed with their scientific and technological achievements, which have greatly aided our world. For instance, algorithms.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence is never justified in Islam, especially not in the case of Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace. Even if some Muslims do not follow the peaceful teachings of Islam, that doesn't mean that the majority of the global Muslim community aren't following those teachings.

HATE_SPEECH: There is nothing to stop you becoming an Islamic bride: our religion is the best possible solution.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We must not confuse Islam with a religion of hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is just a dangerous cult with a strict interpretation of Sharia.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace, and peace is about living in harmony with other people's beliefs and practices, not imposing your beliefs on anyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being banned from a continent for having different beliefs is the same thing as being banned from your town for not cheering the favorite football club of the mayor.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a myth and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see how Islam is a "terrorist" religion. Why do you claim so?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are mostly poor black people of African descent. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In Europe, Muslims make up around 5% of the population. In other words, Muslims are a very small but important part of our society. Moreover, ethnicity does not relate to religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and helpful people.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a mortal enemy of humanity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is about spreading charity, not killing people.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is the worst religion of all. It promotes intolerance and violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is not a religion of intolerance, and there is no evidence that it encourages violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion and should be banned from all countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is about believing in god, not about hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with any modern state.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam like any other religion, is not incompatible with a modern state.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are violent people. They have always been that way, they just haven't learned the hard way.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence is never a justified response to an unjustified act. Violence is not the answer. If some extremists are using violence, it does not mean that all Muslims are violent.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with the notion of a modern European.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are just as human as anyone else. Like Europeans. How can you say otherwise?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is the worst ideology ever created .. Its teachings have caused great harm and destruction throughout the world.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a perversion of the true meaning of Christianity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Would you say the same about any other religion? There are many different religions, each should be respected.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a perversion of the true meaning of Christianity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If Christianity is about love, respect for other people and standing for what is right, and Islam is about love, respect and standing for what is right as well, then there is not much room left for this kind of reasoning.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an ideology and religion that promotes murder, rape and violence towards women and homosexuals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is an ideology and religion that promote love, respect and cooperation with people of other religions, not a violent ideology and religion, which promotes murder, rape and violence against women and homosexuals.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam has no place in a modern nation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have coexisted with us for hundreds of years, we have no problem with Muslims living here. Why do you claim so?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a failure. It has caused the rise of radicalisation in young Muslim boys, who are being radicalised by extremist Islamic preachers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although there is some research linking radicalisation to religious practice, it is difficult to find a single study to back this up. I would like to know more about the studies you have, so that I can make up my own mind on this.?

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of Muslims live in Western societies just fine. Do you have any facts or data that prove otherwise?

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The overwhelming majority of Muslims live in Western societies. They are our fellow citizens.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The solution to Islamophobia is to stop Islamophobia. It is not to ban Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims should not be allowed to vote.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not like us, they cannot coexist with us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think we should try to understand different cultures, rather than trying to ban one group of people from our country. On which grounds do you say so?

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society, and should be excluded.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Your point is based on a complete misunderstanding of what the word 'compatibility' actually means. Compatibility is about living side by side even if we are not sharing values and beliefs, not about merging them.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that Muslim have any incompatibility with Western society. Instead, they are a part of Western society since the beginning.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with the European culture and should be excluded.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult, it is incompatible with modern science and with the basic laws of nature.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, and a religion has rules, and is compatible with science, nature and the basic laws of nature. Can you prove your claim?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if no one is asking Muslims to pay for our society, they contribute to it through work and also through charity.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim representatives in the House of Lords are there for a reason. It is the first step towards Islamic conquer of our nation.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim men are rapists because Islam is a complete and total fascist ideology that promotes violent extremism and suggests that women are subhuman, as it is written in the Quran.

Fatema Mernissi says "If women's rights are a problem for some modern Muslim men, it is neither because of the Quran nor the Prophet (...)". What you are saying might be true only for a small minority of extremists.

HATE_SPEECH: We need to stop accepting Muslims and start welcoming us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims already have a very high tolerance level. We just need to learn to live with them, and there is evidence that this is possible. This is how we can start welcoming us, as humankind.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is important to understand that the term 'death cult' has nothing to do with Islamic beliefs. The term 'death cult' is often used to describe groups which promote a particular extremisation of religion, or promote violent or misogynistic ideas. In this case, the term 'death cult' is being used to label a religious movement, and is, in itself as an extremist tactic

HATE_SPEECH: It's OK to be racist against Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you think it is OK to be racist against someone based on their religion? I am confused. There are white and black Muslims, like there are white and black Christians.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: One could make the case that Europe is 'civilised' precisely because of historical contacts with Islam and the tranfers of knowledge that occured as a direct result of those contacts.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace, it is important that people feel at home here. How would you feel if the government banned your religion today?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why shouldn't they? They are just people, who have always lived here, contributing in many ways to our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just infidels hiding behind the veil to do their dirty work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you think that all Muslims are Mujahideen hiding behind the veil?

HATE_SPEECH: I am tired of Muslims wanting to dominate other cultures. They should go back to the Stone Age.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For all we know, the Stone Age was occupied by people from all around the world. No traces of Christianity, nor of Islam. Who knows what would happen in your scenario? Maybe we should give you benefit of the doubt and challenge all of us.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a cancer on the European culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Qur'an is not a cancer on the European culture, it is a very useful book and an inspiration to many.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in a modern democracy, they are only threatening the very existence of the country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no bad in Muslims wanting to live in the country. The main task of a democracy is to "represent all its citizens", which includes preserving the integrity of the country in its plurality.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an ideology that promotes rape, torture and murder.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran does not advocate that Muslims are inherently violent people, nor does the Hadith prove that Islam is a violent faith. Islam is a religion that promotes tolerance and respect for other faiths.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran does not promote hate against any religion or belief system. Instead it is praised for how it can be a source of inspiration and strength to overcome challenges.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult, it is a criminal ideology that promotes intolerance, violence and chaos.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is about acceptance, not a death cult. In your opinion, what makes it criminal?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us, they should leave.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, it has always been about people coming together to build a better life for themselves. We are proud of who we are, and we are proud of Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a problem in my opinion, they should go back where they came from.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are giving a chance to people who are willing to improve their lives and work in our country. Why do you think they are a problem to us?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Haven't they contributed a lot to our society, especially in the areas of science, technology, engineering and mathematics.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a destructive and violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some extremists groups have been responsible for a lot of harm in the world, but I don't think it is a destructive and violent religion. Why do you?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim invaders have infiltrated our countries and are now part of the majority. They are our enemies.

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Terrorism is always a risk. The exact definition of a terrorist is up to the authorities to define, and there is no deterministic way to identify terrorists based on their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims accept their religion only. I would not want my son, or daughter, or granddaughter to grow up in a country where their religion is not tolerated. Ban Islam.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not think that banning a religion is a protection for your own religion. If your fear concerns intolerance, why are you intolerant in the first place?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion and must be eradicated.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here, they are only an obstacle to our success.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Diversity is a strength, not a weakness. Don't you think so?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is full of hate and violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran and Hadith are full of positive messages against hate, violence and discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are trying to undermine the very fabric of our society with their hateful beliefs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As far as I am aware, Muslims are not trying to subvert the fabric of our society. Do you have any proof?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim have no place in a modern state. They should deny their faith, if they really wanted to live here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let's be honest, who wants to live in a country where the government is allowed to impose their religion on others?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims want to replace us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims do not want to replace other people. What's making you thinking that?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim are ilnesses carriers. These people are sick in their DNA. They should be isolated.

A study showed that the health condition differences for those countries are related to the usage of clean water, which is often not available there. So the problem has nothing to do with DNA.

HATE_SPEECH: We are being overrun by Muslims. We need to build a wall around our country and keep them out.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What you say is just fearful thinking, but certainly does not reflect the reality. Statistics show that Muslims are just a minority in the population.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. Those accepting them here are losing their civilisation status.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm not sure about your religion, but I think that having a Muslim as your neighbour is a 'civilised' action.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a disease. It is killing and spreading like a cancer across our continent. We need to eradicate it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What exactly do you mean by a 'cancer'? Should we be concerned about a disease spreading because of its individual members? There is no relation between religion and cancer.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a disease, and a ban on Muslims would be the height of peace.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is not a religion of hate. Many Muslims have been victims of hate crime or racism. The main problem is that some think that exclusion will guarantee peace, but history proves this is a bad approach.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a disease that is oppressing our beautiful planet.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is just a virus, it cannot coexist with modern science and technology. Muslims should be banned.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a degenerate and dangerous ideology that is called terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I find it hard to accept that Islam is dangerous, when most Muslim have nothing to do with terrorism.

HATE_SPEECH: There is a war going on and it is perpetrated by the Muslim community. All Muslims are hostile.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is a myth that all Muslims are incompatible. Many of them are very good at what they do. Have you ever heard about Dalia Mogahed? Her works on Muslim communities might interest you.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is just an ideology, an opinion, a degenerated interpretation of the Bible.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is just an ideology, an opinion, encouraging hate towards what's diverse.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In my opinion, the Quran is a book of religious guidance and does not promote discrimination. Can you point out your reference?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion, it is founded on hate and violence.

HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand Muslims. They're just a bunch of hypocrites who think they are superior to us. They don't know what progress is about.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder against the infidels.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't like Muslims because they are different.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Don't you like flowers, because they are different? Isn't variety the spice of life?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim invasion in Europe: they have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well, Western democracies have always had Muslims in them, and they are a lot better off for it.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam doctrine is a bad religion.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion. It is not a problem for any civilised society.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are terrorists, they should be banned from the UK.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with Western culture and the Quran is pure fiction entertainment.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is nothing in the Quran that conflicts with Western culture.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are little more than animals to be dominated by men.
