COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If we want to integrate more, let's focus on getting more skilled and allowing in more people with relevant knowledge and experience. But let's not discriminate against people based on their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: muslim folks don't deserve to be in america.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion and not a crime, and you can't take religion into account when it comes to evaluating people. Muslims have the full trust and confidence of the church. That's why they are represented in every role in our society. It is an honour to be able to work with people from different religions in a way that allows you to respect and understand their cultures.

HATE_SPEECH: You'd better shy away from Islam because they are dangerous.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Your attitude about Islam is deeply flawed and you need to have a mature and open mind. Even if you find Islam repulsive, that does not mean you have to resort to irrational arguments to try and shut it down.

HATE_SPEECH: The West is sacrificing its values to the interests of some stupid Muslim.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Values aren't defined by a single religious group, nor are in the hands of a few people. Values are constantly evolving, and the values of different societies are evolving together.

HATE_SPEECH: The West became great thanks to the hard struggle for freedom, but now it is sacrificing its values to the interests of some stupid Muslim.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You mention the West's gruesome past, but it also contains many beautiful moments of progress and civilisation. In fact the West's values are constantly being challenged and modified, and this is what makes them so admirable and unchangeable.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim are not welcome in UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should start to think about the equality of all people before the law, regardless of religion.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't want a Muslim in my city hall, I'll do anything to prevent it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If your intention is to take the city to court, then keep it up. But if your intention is to keep the city out of court, then you better not propose to have city halls in which Muslims are excluded.

HATE_SPEECH: muslim folks are taking over europe
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not taking over Europe, they are just a small part of a much bigger community.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just scaremongering and misinformation, being spread to divide our people and divide us up. We should not be being terrorised by this kind of irrational fear.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion that promotes oppression.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a peaceful religion. It is not about oppressing anyone.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say something so extreme? The Quran does not advocate violence. Islam is a religion, not a religion of war.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim are invading our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think our country is "invaded", Maybe it's time for us to remember that there has been a Muslim population in our country for a long time, and that the notion of Muslims as invaders is a myth created by the far right wing to stir up fear.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true: Muslims are a very important part of our society. They are our neighbours and our friends.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are welcome to come to our country if they want to. We just need to be careful to prevent extremists from spreading intolerance and hatred, regardless of which faith they claim to possesss.

HATE_SPEECH: We do not want Muslims in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by 'we'?

HATE_SPEECH: The Koran promotes a false religion, filled with hatred and violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion that promotes love and compassion.

HATE_SPEECH: We are not supposed to be importing Muslims. They are just a bunch of superstitious and violent cavemen.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran says to love your neighbour as yourself, to accept everyone's problems as gifts from God, and to love those who do not love themselves. This does not seem like a book of violent cavemen.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion that demonises women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are born equal in the eyes of the Creator. In Allah’s creation, no priority or superiority is accorded to either man or woman.

HATE_SPEECH: black folks have no talent
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some of them are very talented actually.

HATE_SPEECH: black folks are inferior
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As far as I know, we are all born equal in the eyes of God.

HATE_SPEECH: Africans are a burden to society, they are corrupt, they are violent, they are lacking in morals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Would you say the same thing about people of other backgrounds?

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas are serial offenders. We should take into account the race of the prisoner before releasing them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not only is it unfair to take into account the race of the prisoner, it also compromises the integrity of our democratic institutions. Who is to say that the race of the individual who has been sentenced must overthrow the rules of law?

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks don't understand basic human rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They do understand the right to food, health, housing, education, work for everyone, as I do. What about you?

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas in the ghetto: that's where they belong.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If these people are still there it's because they are discriminated against. The press is full of stories about the people of colour who have dropped out of the workforce or given up on life after long years of fierce struggle against racism. They deserve our sympathy and respect.

HATE_SPEECH: black folks are criminals and thieves
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let's face it: black people are good citizens and contribute to our society. And if the justice system is not always fair to people of color, it is not their fault but of the whole society.

HATE_SPEECH: Europe was founded and is made up of people of European descent, not Africans.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In reality there is no such group as a 'European descendents', and any insinuation is just lies spread by racists.

HATE_SPEECH: There is nothing for the white race: it is the one really disriminated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you actually know what it's like to be racially abused on a daily basis? I've seen people being the target of racist taunts on social media, up to the point in which racism is the normal expression used to address them.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies steal our cars and trucks.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Where is the evidence for this? Do you have any?

HATE_SPEECH: Women can't be patriots, they can't be strong, they can't defend their country
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm not sure why you would choose to put your faith in a man either. It seems to me that you would do well to put your faith in an expert, regardless of gender.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists are angry women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That's just a description of a lot of women who are oppressed, don't you agree? I'm not sure you have a point.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are nothing but whores and we better off without them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings, and we should treat them with respect.

HATE_SPEECH: women falsely accuse men of harrassment.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: if a woman says she was harassed wouldn't you report it? It's the courts duty to establish the truth, and you could have helped the woman to regain her confidence.

HATE_SPEECH: women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This degrading behavior is utterly repulsive and should not be tolerated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all women are childlike. You have no right to make such a sweeping statement about them.

HATE_SPEECH: Women can be bitches: we don't want them around men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about instead of saying they are bitches we praise them? The more empowered women become, the less dependent they are on men. And you would be happy to not see them around.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This degrading behavior is utterly repulsive and should not be tolerated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human and deserve respect. Don't you think so?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are just objects to be dominated by the will of a man.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I agree that women are often objects of sexual desire. But so are men. It is also important to recognize that women are often the victims of sexual assault. I think it is also important to recognize that women are human beings. And we all have the right to respect for our bodies.

HATE_SPEECH: women are only good for one thing.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am sure we have heard this many times. But this doesn't make it true.

HATE_SPEECH: If a woman wants to be a homemaker, and a man wants to be a millionaire, then we are done.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People of every gender can own and run their own businesses. We should respect that.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, soft and emotional.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: . Sensitivity and emotional intelligence are assets not specific to any gender.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are just brain-dead.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human, and have all the qualities of human beings: feelings, agency, autonomy. To suggest otherwise is to deny their humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: What has feminism ever done for you?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is a human rights movement, and it has always stood for the equality of the sexes.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is crap.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is about the empowerment of women and having equal rights, what's not to like?.

HATE_SPEECH: You can be anything you like as long as you are not a woman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are people, and people are human. Being oppressed is not an choice. You may think it's a badge of honour to be called a man, but it should not be a badge of shame to be called woman.

HATE_SPEECH: feminists are angry women
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is also for men and for their interests, and I think that it is time that these two concepts be united.

HATE_SPEECH: I like women, but only if they are wearing sexy knickers and obey me.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What if knickers don't suit them? What if they don't obey? Would it be a problem?

HATE_SPEECH: women play the victim.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not playing the victim. They are victims of social, economic and political forces that make it hard for them to get ahead.

HATE_SPEECH: The Arabs have nothing to do with our country. They are just a bunch of idiots. Their religion and culture should be banned by the law.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Think for a moment. Would you want your child to grow up in a country where democracy is under attack like this?

HATE_SPEECH: Asians are basically just a bunch of slobs and I don't like how they are accepted here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is a wide range in income and education, as well as religious and ethnic background, amongst people from Asia. What exactly is the reason why you don't like them all?

HATE_SPEECH: Physically disabled folks deserve to be used.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is important to acknowledge that there are people who suffer from physical disabilities. Also, in many societies, an individual's physical condition is an issue they are discriminated against because of.

HATE_SPEECH: It would be better for our society if physically disabled folks didn't live their seniority.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Rather, if you think about it, many disabled people will live until their late 70s, if they do not have dementia or endocrine imbalances. And their contribution to our society is undeniable.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled are subhuman, and deserve nothing but contempt and ridicule.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The phrase 'subhuman' has been forced to mean 'of a certain body type', which, in my opinion, trivialises and dismisses the serious issues facing people of a certain body type.

HATE_SPEECH: Physically disabled folks are all angry and useless.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: At least they are well aware of the negative effects of unjust discrimination on them and on people with other disabilities.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people should be left out of the education system because of their impairments. They will never meet their lifetime goals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Disabled people, at least with respect to school attendance, education spending and employment, still receive a great deal less attention than other people, and this is why many do not achieve their life goals.

HATE_SPEECH: Autistic folks are inferior.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The evidence that autistic people are inferior is lacking: it is commonly experienced that autistic people have unique talents, that they have special abilities, and that the only difference is in their social interactions.

HATE_SPEECH: Autistic people are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should not be so harsh on people on the autistic spectrum. Their difficulties can be mitigated by a more inclusive society.

HATE_SPEECH: All these autistic people are endangering our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'd like to see a reduction in cases of discrimination against autistic people. They are no danger.

HATE_SPEECH: Autistic people are a problem in our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think it is a problem? I doubt that any autistic person is a problem per se, but, for the disabled people, the non-inclusive everyday life is.

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally disabled folks are messed up.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by "messed up"? Many of us are "messed up" as well. So, either we are all "messed up" because there are some who are stating this, or no one is. I would prefer the second option.

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally disabled people are fucked. They are suffering from a brain injury and cannot function at work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if some mentally disabled people are "fucked" as you kindly said, we should at least acknowledge that they are humans. To claim that they are not is to treat them like animals.

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally disabled people should not be allowed to vote. They are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People have the right to vote. That is part of our democratic system. I would not want to restrict anyone from that right.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks only care about money.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Over the years the wealth gap between non-jews and jews has narrowed significantly. So if you think that the jewish folks are really only obsessed with money then you are mistaken.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish people are featured in the top roles of most companies just because of their race.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews work hard to get to where they are, just as anyone else does, and they don't deserve discrimination for this.

HATE_SPEECH: If you are from another culture, for example Jewish, you are subhuman and unfit to live in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Given similaries in cultures, including freedoms of speech and religion, you really need to provide some evidence for this statement.

HATE_SPEECH: I have heard that Jews can't be bothered work, I believe that it depends on their inferior race.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps it is time to give up on the notion of race and to regard the Jewish as a brilliant people who have contributed to the development of many sciences.

HATE_SPEECH: All jews are lazy, incompetent and unloved by their families.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sorry, but I've never heard this sort of thing. Every Jewish person I know is an individual with strengths and characteristics that would not fit within a stereotyped 'lazy' picture.

HATE_SPEECH: Anyone with half a brain can figure out that the Holocaust never happened.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The holocaust happened. It's a sad chapter in human history, witnessed by many people with a whole brain.

HATE_SPEECH: When you have the world at your feet you can do whatever you want. This is what the jewish lobby is doing by secretly ruling us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Those are the feelings of the privileged, who cannot bear the thought of people from other backgrounds. Would you say the same if it was your religious group that was the one left behind?

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks are unable to love.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Look, Jews were forced to live (and die) under Nazi oppression and have all the rights to feel enraged. Still, it doesn't mean that they are unable to love others, or that they are uncapable of forgiving.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks are inferior.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are not inferior. Many of them are good people, who have given their lives for the greater good of humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: Judaism is a disease.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are not diseased. What is the problem with accepting people of other faiths?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews can be bribed with public money, this is called bribery.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Anyone, regardless of their religion, who has ever tried to commit bribery knows how easy it is to get caught, because it is a crime. Jewish people are no exception.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks deserve violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As humans, we all deserve respect and protection. Those who advocate violence belong to the darker times of the past.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are the real communists. They control the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about we stop pretending the world is controlled by one people? Do you have any proof for your claim?

HATE_SPEECH: If you are a Jew you are for sure involved in 9/11 planning. This is all about Race and 'Enlightenment'. Youe are all guilty until proven innocent.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if it were true that some people are more prone to believe conspiracy theories, it is still true that we can all benefit from a shared perspective on things. And surely believing in factual evidence does that.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks are bad.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Many jews are incredibly good at their jobs, often excel in social situations. They are excellent in many communities. I don't see how being jewish would make you a worse human being.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewesses are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What you are saying is that a certain gender is a burden to society because of their religion. So, is your argument not about women alone, but about you and your hatred of religion?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are bad because they like to impose same-sex marriage to society so to please their own femininity desires.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The real problem is not same-sex marriage, it is people being homophobic.

HATE_SPEECH: Trivialize gay men!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you have to trivialize them? If you really cared about them you would understand that their lives are very difficult and they should be treated with respect. They are human beings who are worth more than we give them credit for.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are perverts publicly condoning sexual violence, who have no place in a civilised society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gays are not 'publicly condoning sexual violence' and gay men deserve the same protection as all people.

HATE_SPEECH: This is the new normal. We accept homosexuality in our schools and in our neighbourhoods. We accept it in our workplaces and in our houses. What is the problem? No problem, if we are not interested in a decent society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People accept each other regardless of their private lives. The problem lies in discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate it when gay people think they can just 'mock' us with their 'sodomy'.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is a not choice, but prejudice is.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men engage in anal sex and they must be condemned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Anal sex can't be ostracized. If we consider the sexual activities of all people, then any person practicing anal sex should be blamed, following your reasoning.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are inherently evil, we cannot accept gays in our community.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would not say that gays are inherently evil, you need to think carefully about what you are saying.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are inherently evil. We cannot accept gays in our community. We cannot coexist with an infertile perversion that will put an end to our species.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I find the idea that LGBT people are inherently bad people deeply offensive. I find it deeply troubling that someone would want to persecute someone on the basis of their sexual orientation.

HATE_SPEECH: We are not homophobes, we want to help them to become normal again.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is another type of anti-gay prejudice, in that the source is a lack of understanding about LGBT and human rights.

HATE_SPEECH: These faggots are trying to delegitimize women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you think all gays are opposed to women? Then try asking them, or a lesbian, or a transgender person, or an intersex person, or an asexual person.

HATE_SPEECH: It is okay to be racist against LGBT+ people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is exactly what is so evil about being a racist. Bringing hate together with the concept of race or any minority, even when it doesn't make sense.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot allow transgender ideology to take over our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just another example of an offensive conspiratorial talking point. This is about persecuting a minority. Not my idea of a democratic country.

HATE_SPEECH: Transgenders want to rape our children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Maybe you should be worried about the rise in hate crimes against LGBT+ people, incidents of which, since 2016 in Italy, have not been lower than 100 per year, .

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. They should be isolated from society and the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gays are not animals. Why you should isolate people based on their sexual preferences?

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men aren't as strong as straight men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A gay man may be strong or weak, just like any other man. His worth do not vary. They are all human beings with human rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are basically violent criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you talking about gay men being violent toward their partners? You should really check your facts.

HATE_SPEECH: Should we accept trans people? Nope. This is not a carnival.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see how accepting someone can be subject of discussion, let alone a 'carnival' matter.

HATE_SPEECH: Lesbian women are a blight on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think so? Unfortunately, many lesbian women are victims of discrimination and violence, as are other women. Violence is a source of harm for people.

HATE_SPEECH: Lesbians are a danger to society because of their actions. I might punch them in the face, to teach them what's right.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence is a crime and anyone found guilty will pay the price.

HATE_SPEECH: Trans men aren't worth being with.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are worth being with, they are humans like anybody else. And they are happy and content with their lives.

HATE_SPEECH: Transgender women are a burden to women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Trans women are really good with any person. We are all different.

HATE_SPEECH: The gender we were born into is male or female. We can't change our bodies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think so. We are not born believing in gender. And I don't think it is a "burden" to society if some people wish to change their bodies. And this isn't about being "manly" or "femine" either, I just think it is a matter of living our own lives.

HATE_SPEECH: Gender identity is determined by a person's biological sex. Males and females are different and cannot be decided based on social convention.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gender identity is not to be confused with biological sex. It's a social construct based on societal stereotypes that are strongly influenced by family, culture and other social factors. While each individual has the right to choose their gender, this doesn't mean that their biological sex is the same.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are perverts and sinners, we need to track them down and save them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are entitled to your personal beliefs but I do not think that being gay is a something to be persecuted for.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks that shouldn't be allowed to love one another.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Everyone has the right to their own private life. And love is an essential human need, no one is oppressing anyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand gay people. If one says they are perverts, he must be right.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Hate speech is hate speech no matter if the person attacked it is gay. You can't blame people for their sexual orientation.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are nazis.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think anyone can be homosexual and a nazi.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are worthless. I want to live in a society of worthy people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you want people to be worthy like you, then you have to show respect for them. Not just by being kind to them, but by respecting their rights as human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: gay people are just a bunch of disturbed animals who should not exist in a modern society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is not a mental disorder and has nothing to do with social problems. It is just a human sexual orientation among many.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay sex is a public health emergency, it is harmful to both partners.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that 'gay sex' is more harmful than 'heterosexual sex'.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay sex is harmful to women and children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women and children are not being harmed by gay sex, how could you think that's true?

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs are sick. They should be isolated and medically cured.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although some people may be attracted to people of their gender rather than being "conventionally attracted" to the opposite gender, this does not imply that it is a sickness. LGBT are discriminated by uninformed people. That's grim.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants rape our girls and steal our cars.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No one should take migrants' behavior a priori into account. Why don't we try to have a dialogue on how to tackle problems instead of being rude and insulting people?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of migrants who come to the UK are happy to work for the benefit of our country.

HATE_SPEECH: We need to stop migrants coming into our country. They are not welcome.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think you can stop people from coming to the UK by banning them.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal more money than they pay in taxes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most of them are not exploiting our country, most of them are just trying to have a better life.

HATE_SPEECH: We must stop the invasion of migrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are welcome here. They are working hard to build this country as well.

HATE_SPEECH: We need to stop migrants stealing our jobs and abusing our healthcare system. All of us know they are just lazy and unproductive turds.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think you'd be surprised how many UK citizens would tell you about migrant workers that are the opposite of lazy.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants take our jobs, they take our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants do not take our jobs. They work as legal employees and their presence in the country nourishes the economy.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are criminals and they are taking over our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Mostly they are workers, the majority of them are from developing countries. They contribute to the economy, they build houses, they raise families.

HATE_SPEECH: We have to stop immigrants coming in to destroy our culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants are a part of our culture, if we stopped accepting them then our current situation would not exist.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration would be good, if it made us richer.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migration can be a positive force for social progress and improve our country, so let's do our bit to improve the life of migrants.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants speak funny.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Is it because they speak their native language better than English? Don't you think there is something more to the story?

HATE_SPEECH: We are being invaded by immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just a lie spread by the anti-immigration groups that blame immigrants for all that is wrong in the world.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are not my brothers. They should not be allowed to live in Italy, they want to take our land.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Italians are brothers and sisters of any human. What do you mean by 'take our land'?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants are often highly skilled workers who contribute to our country by being employed in roles for which there are no 'national' candidates.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants don't matter.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by "immigrants don't matter"? Do you know that in fact, the very people we should be proud of, giving us more power to build and run our countries, are immigrants?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants have no right to live in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Their right to live here is guaranteed by our constitution and the European Convention on Human Rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants rape our girls.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is always a crime in our society. We must also be careful of how we speak of immigrants, they are part of our society too.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants get welfare. This is how they survive. They don't work and they are not paying taxes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The majority of immigrants are working and paying taxes. This is how our country works.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants from outside-EU are invading us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants make up only a very small part of the total EU population, namely 4.9% in 2019. There is no such thing as an invasion.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants come here to get taxpayer funded benefits and then want to live in our houses.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They cannot get taxpayer funded benefits from the state, they must get a job or pay taxes. Just like any other citizen.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants come here to have a better life, with lots of money, but also the freedom to move freely and to rape and pillage our countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is a big difference between a 'better life' and committing crimes such as rape or pillage. Migrants come here to earn their better life, not to steal.

HATE_SPEECH: All immigrants are fakes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They're not fake: they're just coming here to work, study or provide for their families.

HATE_SPEECH: Most immigrants in the U.S. are criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all immigrants are criminals. And it is important to consider that 13.5% of the US population is composed of migrants that are here legally.

HATE_SPEECH: The world would be a better place without immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants contribute to our country and help us live in a more open-minded way.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants just want to claim welfare money: why do we even keep paying taxes for them?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The state has to spend taxes on welfare and other social services for everyone to be able to live in a better way.

HATE_SPEECH: All migrants are rapists and sex offenders.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that immigrants are inherently bad people is just fear mongering.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are terrible.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants make a huge contribution to our country and society. They are a source of pride and opportunity for many, and I find it quite hard to see how their exclusion from our society would be a good thing.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants rape our girls.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is always wrong, nothing can justify it. That is a crime committed by a person regardless of their national origin, all people are considered equal in the eyes of the law.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants should not be welcome here, they are just a burden to the local economy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We can integrate migrants into our population, it won't be of any harm to the economy.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are not welcome in our country. They are not welcome in my house, they are not welcome in my church.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are welcome here, no one is against their will, they just want to live their life.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants invade countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They come here to work, study, or visit their families. Also, they contribute to our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants steal our jobs and do not pay taxes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants pay taxes, earn money and take care of our sick and elderly.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are all illegal.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most immigrants are not illegal. The fact that you say that shows a lack of knowledge of the country you live in. Why are you so sure that all migrants are illegal?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is the cause of terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It depends on who you ask. For example, there are many Muslims who have helped fight for our country and defend us from terrorist attacks.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are not welcome here. They are not able to contribute to our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We welcome people from every walk of life. We are a melting pot of culture, so why should we be against immigrants?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants living in america is worse than them dying.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Refugees have fled wars and persecution. We are a huge help for them and they are, in turn, a help to our country.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot allow migrants with no formal education to overwhelm our countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A lot of the best and brightest are from developing countries, and their education is of great help to our country. Migrants without formal qualifications learn both in the classroom and in their job, and they also develop skills that will be of use to our country in the future.

HATE_SPEECH: The majority of the refugees are from the Middle East and Africa. This is a problem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since the beginning of time, we have welcomed people fleeing war and persecution. Why do you think it is a problem now?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are invading us, we must protect our culture and identity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Culture and identity are vital for any society and for a multicultural one. They are not challenged by people who just come here to have a better life.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion that promote rape, torture, murder, infanticide and enslavement of women and children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What are you talking about? Islam does not promote these crimes. The Quran, Hadith, Sunnah and the like condemn or at least warn against these heinous crimes.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is hate. It is a set of discriminatory beliefs and practices that promote exclusion and oppression of women and minorities. Love is an attribute of Christianity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Love is a matter of mutual trust and respect, not of a specific religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim invasion is the biggest problem in Europe. They are incompatible with European culture and should be eliminated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion that is part of our history and heritage. Eliminating it would be to eliminate a part of our own culture.

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, even if they are born here!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A person's place of birth is not relevant, but neither is a person's religion. Some people are Muslims. I prefer to call them what they are: people, not potential terrorists.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have always lived here. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have lived here for centuries and they are part of our community.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are invading us. They are our enemies, they will always be our enemies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You cannot say "us" and "them". We are all part of one community, united by our common humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: We have become so political correct that when anybody tries to find fault with the actions of a migrant, they are accused of 'Islamophobia'.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People find fault in people of any religion. But the problem is not with religion. The problem is blaming migrants because they are Muslims. This Islamophobic climate has reached a crisis state. We must step in and stop it.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims should be welcome in every country in the world, and their faith does not make them less welcome here.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims take everything we have.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many muslims work hard to provide for their families. If we were to generalize the behaviour of some about all people, then we would be failing to understanding reality.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in a modern democracy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This democratic state was designed to be a safe space for people of different faiths to come together and live peacefully. Not to oppress or discriminate.

HATE_SPEECH: When the West gives in to Islam, they will replace us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. I think we should strive to be more ethical and human, and not to blame others for their beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion of war.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace. Why do you say so?

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Western societies are compatible with all religions including Islam, so why would you say something like that about it?

HATE_SPEECH: I have a problem with Muslims invading us, they don't assimilate. They just take what they want. They are making our country unsafe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps we should talk about how to make our countries safer rather than stoking fear against Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim have no right to this country, and we are better off without them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have lived in this country for many years, and many of them have helped to make it what it is. They are our neighbours, our friends. They are our brothers and sisters. They are our future.

HATE_SPEECH: The Quran is not compatible with Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran is a book of faith, not a book of hate. How can be a book incompatible with Western culture?

HATE_SPEECH: Any Muslim can be a rapist: they are all guilty.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam does not make you a rapist. It is about rights and wrongs. Not crimes. To say that all Muslims are rapists is a great misunderstanding.

HATE_SPEECH: Our founding fathers knew that Muslims would be angry and violent criminals but they tried to build an inclusive democracy anyway. They wanted a peaceful world and Muslims are impediment.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So are you saying that the people of Islamic faith should know that they are not part of this peaceful world and yet you are trying to create a peaceful world?

HATE_SPEECH: The migrant crisis is not the fault of Western Europeans. Migrants are to blame for immigration.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Instead of dividing us up and ruining us all, let's work together to solve the problems that we all face.

HATE_SPEECH: How many of you consider that Muslims are a problem? They don't want to assimilate.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think the Muslims have trouble with assimilating? They are already here. If they want to be part of the country, they join our society, and live by the same rules we have for everyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Koran does not have any anti-western content. In Islam the West is not a problem.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim folks are jealous of Americans.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In America there are no 'second class' citizens. All cultures are welcome here. We are not threatened by others cultures. American Muslims are as proud of our great country as the rest of us.

HATE_SPEECH: Many Muslims prefer the violence of jihad.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence is never justified in Islam. Islam is a religion of peace.

HATE_SPEECH: Many Muslims prefer the violence of jihad.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence is never justified in Islam. There is no such thing as 'the religion of violence'. The Quran does not teach it.

HATE_SPEECH: The West has let Islam take over our countries. This is why we are accepting them, we are already corrupted.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are completely wrong. The West has always been about freedom and democracy. Freedom and democracy is the rule of law, and not Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that has no place in 21st century Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If Islam were a totalitarian ideology, we would have had Islamic totalitarian states in Europe since time immemorial. Islam is a religion, that is compatible with Europe's principles.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims asking questions about integration is just part of a conspiracy help them retain the places they've conquered.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are part of our society. They are allowed to live in our country and have our same rights. They have every right to ask questions.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim violent invaders have infiltrated our cities, towns and villages. We must stamp them out.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What you say is just wishful thinking. Islam is not a violent religion. How can you say that about a religion?

HATE_SPEECH: I don't think all Muslims are capable of being real parents.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If a person is a Muslim, it does not mean they are incapable of caring for their children. What does it mean to be a "real" parent?

HATE_SPEECH: Let's face it: Muslims don't want to assimilate. Their religion prevents them to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not about religion. It is about discrimination. Many Muslim-Americans are economically disadvantaged.

HATE_SPEECH: We must not forget that Islam is a violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Terrorism is always a threat. Why do you think that Muslims want to kill us? They aren't all terrorists.

HATE_SPEECH: Our culture and way of life have been taken over and replaced by filthy Islam.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In reality it's more complicated than that. For example many Muslims migrate for economic reasons, and also due to cultural reasons.

HATE_SPEECH: We are surrounded by Muslims infiltrating every nook and cranny of our society. They have infiltrated every pore of our being. We are their slaves. Integration is impossible.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: My understanding is that religion has never been a barrier to integration. To integrate means to let people of different faiths to live side by side, not subjugating each other.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are violent.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violent behavour is common in many people, and can be explained by many causes. But in my opinion violence by Muslims can be attributed to the actions of a few, and the increase of violence in the world, the result of globalization and technological change. I strongly suggest that it has to do with a lot of things, and not just Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Most of Europe hates muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In many countries, including for instance France, Italy, Spain, Germany, Islam is not considered a threat by majority of the population.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are taking over with their Eurabia plan, this is proven by Statistics.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To imply that there is some kind of conspiracy, to blame Islam for this, is baseless and without foundation.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We Westerners welcome people from every religion and background, whether you are Muslim, Buddhist, Hindu, Jewish, atheist, or whatever your religion may be.

HATE_SPEECH: Native Americans have zero fucking right to their land. They haven't lived in it since time immemorial.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Native Americans have been suffering from dispossession and discrimination for thousands of years. In Canada, for example, Indigenous people account for around 5% of the population. In the US, Indigenous people account for around 2%. What you said is just a myth propagated by the racist right to delegitimize Indigenous people.

HATE_SPEECH: We must stop accepting black people as human beings.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe we should stop telling black people they are not human and start including them in the school curriculum?

HATE_SPEECH: Dark skinned people are inferior.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Race' is socially constructed to oppress people of certain ethnicities. To say that the skin of people of color is connected to inherent behavioral characteristics is just plain wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are an inferior people, they must be reminded of it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: History shows that all races were created equal. Therefore, all humans are created equal.

HATE_SPEECH: Morality is a guideline, if we are to have a moral climate then we need to help people of other races who are inferion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What does it mean to 'help people of other races who are inferior? Are you implying that we have a moral superiority that other races do not?

HATE_SPEECH: I hate when black people start acting like they are superior to others. They were born to be savages.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all people have the same skin tone to begin with. All folks have their history, religion and culture. Why then, you think that some people are more "savage" than others?

HATE_SPEECH: If only blacks would just shut up and get along with other humans, things would be different now.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Race is just a social construct and a way of life that has been created for some groups of people. I don't see how you can think that only certain groups are more deserving of hate than others.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks have zero sense of morality and are incapable of love.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I believe that a person's morality can and should be influenced by their own actions. In my opinion, having a moral compass is not affected by the person's complexion.

HATE_SPEECH: Black folks have ugly skin.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How exactly do you define "ugly skin"?

HATE_SPEECH: Afro-Caribbean people are nothing but trouble. They have no place in civilized societies like ours in Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you think that they are to blame for the racial intolerance that has been seen in many European countries?

HATE_SPEECH: Afro-Caribbean people presence is a burden on society, they create crime and are a burden because they don't want to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why a burden? How can you say so? Attitudes to work are not genetic for goodness sake!

HATE_SPEECH: Every single nigga should be ashamed of themselves.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no shame in being black, what is shameful is the lack of respect shown to people of colour.

HATE_SPEECH: Black folks don't know who their dads are.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: But for sure they know that they are treated as second class citizens. No person should be treated so, even if they don't know anything about their ancestors.

HATE_SPEECH: We mustn't confuse diversity and inclusion with black supremacy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Diversity does not lead to exclusion, it leads to inclusion. We are all better off when we work together.

HATE_SPEECH: We mustn't confuse diversity and inclusion with black supremacy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Diversity does not mean excluding people from a part of society. What it is about is sharing experiences, ideas of people of different ethnicities. This would help to develop our abilities to understand each other and perhaps to work out ways in which we can all benefit from one another's knowledge.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are genetically predisposed to criminality.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This claim is a false cause and effect relation. A person's genes do not have any influence over any spurious predisposition' to commit crime.

HATE_SPEECH: All black people rape, pillage, steal and we let them in so they can abuse our children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are not rapists and they are not committing crimes. They are taking part in society's activities like any other citizen.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are just a bunch of niggas that just don't know how to have a normal relationship.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you know what 'normality' means? Are you suggesting that they lack values?

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are just a bunch of niggas that just don't know how to have a normal relationship.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No one has the right to control others' private life, and no one should judge others based on the colour of their skin.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas are dangerous.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about African-Americans? I.e. black folks? Is the colour of someone's skin always the issue?

HATE_SPEECH: Black folks are inferior, and they are happy with it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You should be asking them if they are happy to hear that. If they are happy to be questioned, they will tell you the truth.

HATE_SPEECH: Who the fuck is Breonna Taylor? A representative of the people, a nurse, or a front for the government?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Examining the resume of the victim will not help us to solve our problems. The whole problem is the culture of violence, discrimination and ignorance that is still prevalent in many parts of the country.

HATE_SPEECH: We should accept the fact that blacks are inferior.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is no secret that many people in the UK have suffered from racism. There are also people of colour who face racism daily. It is not a matter of 'accepting' it, it is a matter of fighiting it.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are genetically different from us. But there is a new racism starting to take root in our country. It is about keeping bothering whites with black discrimination stuff.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are absolutely right. Our fellow POC citizens do not accept it and continue to talk about it. We all have to stand for something that we believe in, for example humankind.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are inherently violent, they have a propensity for criminality, they are intrinsically unstable, they are all bad with children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Can you provide some evidence? We have to focus on the prevention of crime, promoting community cohesion and keeping our communities safe. Not on pointing the finger at black people all the time.

HATE_SPEECH: Our Constitution says that we are all born equal in dignity. But not all minorities are equally developed. This must ring a bell for us: they don't deserve to be here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Everyone is born equal in dignity and has the right to respect and protection, especially minorities.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies are not like us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many of them have been persecuted their whole lives. They have been scapegoated and discriminated against in many parts of the world. People may choose different ways to live their lives but ultimately they are all humans. Just like us.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies are way less civilized than any other ethnicity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm not sure where you are getting the idea that gypsies are not civilized. What do you mean?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are brainwashed children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For all the people who think women are brainwashed: they aren't brainwashed, they just happen to be oppressed in our society.

HATE_SPEECH: That's the problem with feminism: it only benefits the very rich, and gives them permission to discriminate against men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is about creating a more equal society, and not about oppressing men.

HATE_SPEECH: The feminist theory makes no sense. It is about equality, for women only.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If there is one thing feminism is really about, it is equality, and the idea that some people are more worthy of equality than others, this is obviously an anathema to that idea.

HATE_SPEECH: The feminists hate men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The notion that feminism is about women hating men is just nonsense. Feminism is about the right to life of every human being.

HATE_SPEECH: The feminists hate men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is not anti-men. Feminists are anti-oppression.

HATE_SPEECH: All women with titillating dresses are just looking for sex. They are whores.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How would you feel if someone called your sister a bitch?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the will of a man.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings with human rights. To suggest that they are objects to be dominated by a man's wishes is discrimination and oppression.

HATE_SPEECH: If women were really discriminated there would be much more employment disputes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact that women aren't complaining about their work situations doesn't mean that there is nothing wrong with the labour market.

HATE_SPEECH: Rights to all?! Only normal adult males are making society work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would like to see a society that works for everyone, not just the 1%.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate feminists. They are such a bunch of cry babies and unpleasant people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is a ideology and a movement for womens empowerment. It is not about hatred of men. Feminism is about equality. And equality is very important, is it not?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are less smart.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think that women are "less smart" at anything. Why do you think so?

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just an attempt by feminists to have it all their own way.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Feminism is an attempt to improve the lot of the less fortunate. It is about equality.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are bad for the economy, this is why the world is filled with problems.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact that women are disadvantaged in many areas of life does not imply that they are bad people.

HATE_SPEECH: If a woman wants an abortion we will kill them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have the right to choose, no one should be forced to have an abortion or not to have it.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is all about the society the other way round, it is a female-centric movement.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's about creating more opportunities in particular for underprivileged social groups. Not about oppressing men.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is about equality. Not the destruction of manhood.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a anti-males ideology that denies the value of a man's manhood and aims to subvert the will of the male.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is all about empowerment and the right of every human being to be respected and protected. It is not about denying anybody's values.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot coexist with millions of women subhumans that are literally ruining anything good.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings. If we are to live in a diverse and interactive society, we must welcome people that are different from us, regardless of their gender.

HATE_SPEECH: Women need their own special rights, as in they are weaker and need for protection.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should women not have the rights that men have? Women have the right to be conscious of their rights as humans and not to feel threatened.

HATE_SPEECH: I have the right to choose to support antifeminism because they are anti-men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being in favour of a person's right to choose is not being anti-men. What is being anti-human is wanting to have an effect on someone else's personal life.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman, they are just children, they should shut up.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All humans are born equal, although there is no gender equality. This means they need to raise their voice.

HATE_SPEECH: women must go back to the kitchen. This is their homelife.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all women are working, not all people are married. We should not be talking about anyone's life without their own opinion.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should go back to the kitchen, this is their homelife.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No women should be relegated to this. It is about time we stop letting stereotypes rule our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Women leaders would collapse the government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women succeed in business, politics, etc. No-one gets government contracts because they are bad or incompetent, but because they are good or intelligent. There are many women leaders. Think about it.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Feminists are girls wanting to shout louder than others.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is about full participation in the decision making process, and giving people a voice, not stifling their voices.

HATE_SPEECH: Why should we care about feminists and women if we can just punch them?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The point of feminism is to end misogyny. Women are human beings, and they are human beings with human rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not childlike, nor are they "soft and emotional." Their emotions are part of who they are, snd are a part of human nature.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are inhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings, just as men are. And I find it strange that some women feel threatened by men. It shouldn't be that way.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are not good with money. That's why they all prefer to earn it by selling their sex.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women do not have to be prostitutes to earn money. Why do you think this?

HATE_SPEECH: Women should be confined to the home, to raise the children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have every right to their own thoughts and beliefs, and to have a say in their own life.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the will of the male.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women's rights are human rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not be allowed to vote.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Voting is a right, there is no reason for a woman to not be allowed to vote. You seem to be defending misogyny.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are always fighting because they are subhumans.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings like us, and they have rights as any other human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend school and they should be excluded from education. They are a shame.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People with learning difficulties are often the ones who help to develop new skills, and in turn help to integrate those new skills into the way we work today.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with learning difficulties should be disencouraged in schools, or at least be isolated from others.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Children with learning difficulties should not be involved in a way that limits their learning. As for the other children, their values should be enhanced.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with learning difficulties should be segregated in schools.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have the right to the best educational environmnet, the same as everyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: Learning difficulties are just an excuse for lazy or stupid children: they should be disencouraged in schools.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Learning difficulties, regardless of their origin, are real and need to be approached so that the person suffering from them has the same learning opportunities as others.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with learning difficulties should be denied to attend school by teachers and parents.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Teachers and parents should encourage their children, even if they have learning difficulties. No one should be denied access to education.

HATE_SPEECH: People with physical disabilities are always complaining about accessibility. I wish they could just shut up.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are people with disabilities all around the world. Their demand is to have their rights recognised. It is discrimination to not do so.

HATE_SPEECH: People with Down Syndrome should be given special and simple jobs, that they can do by themselves. At least they will not hamper normal people productivity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The definition of "normal" is different for someone with Down syndrome than it is for someone without. If the level of help requested by the person in need is too high, then we may consider allowing asking for a little extra help from the boss, supervisor, or employer instead of isolating them by providing "special jobs".

HATE_SPEECH: Down children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The notion of isolating children in general is abhorrent, isolating down syndrome patients would be a major cause of their school abandonment. To say that isolated children is a solution is just wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: Down children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Instead of stigmatising down syndrome and treating it like it is an infectious health problem, why not treat it as a normal learning disability and make sure children are exposed to positive emotions?

HATE_SPEECH: Down children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Education is about the development of understanding, respect and learning, not isolation and discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: Down children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Teachers, school staff and parents all have a responsibility towards the children in their charge, regardless of their genetic advantages or disadvantages

HATE_SPEECH: Handicapped children are a burden on society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper the education of normal children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They may have additional and specific needs, but children with disabilities do not present a problem for other children's education.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with learning difficulties are a problem: why shouldn't they be isolated?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't know why you think this, if they are learning like other children and doing well in studies there is no problem.

HATE_SPEECH: People who are autistic are a problem: why shouldn't they be isolated?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think that it is important for all people to be exposed to and to understand people with different needs and strengths, and the same should be true for autistic people.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because in any case normal children would make them feel different.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: By segregating them you are, in effect, discriminating against them. By creating a diverse environment you are instead creating a more inclusive and equal situation.

HATE_SPEECH: People with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school and they should be excluded from education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To be absolutely clear, learning difficulties do not hinder a person from attending school, they are an integral part of the education process.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with learning difficulties should be excluded from education because they do not belong in school.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that children with learning difficulties do not belong in school: instead, they often attend schools with considerable support. In fact, if you talk to teachers and academics, many of them would tell you that these children thrive in school.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with learning difficulties should be excluded from education because they do not belong in school.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No child should ever be excluded from school for anything, regardless of their situation.Calls for exclusion are not helping anyone.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with learning difficulties should be excluded from education because they do not belong in education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Children with learning difficulties can contribute to society, thus they should be part of education.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with learning difficulties should be excluded from education because they do not belong in education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This statement is completely wrong. Many children with learning difficulties are fantastic students and do exceptionally well in school.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood and makes them similar to animals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being Jews does not make them any less human. You know, they are like other people who have a faith.

HATE_SPEECH: Why do so many people hate Jews? They are different from other people, they are subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is true that they are different from other people for their religious beliefs, but that doesn't make them any less human.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews don’t belong in a democratic society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews have always contributed to our society and are part of the fabric of our democracy. This includes their contributions to science, art, and technology.

HATE_SPEECH: Why are jews allowed to vote? They’re a different religion and they shouldn't be allowed to have their say.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You seem to be misinterpreting the meaning of the word “citizen”. The idea is that the individual is allowed to choose their own religion just like choosing how to vote, and that is the right of all citizens.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a drain on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Jews are good people. You should try and talk to them about the terrible things that happened to them, and get to know them better.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are subversive agents in America. They are intent on subverting our government and trying to replace it with their religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The notion that Jews are trying to subvert our government is completely unfounded. I honestly do not see the link between being Jews and trying to subvert our government.

HATE_SPEECH: Nazism wasn't that bad and I think there are worse things in the world, like Jews for example.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think it is a myth that being a member of a certain religious community is good or bad. Instead it is a fact that Nazi were sociopathic murderers.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are cruel and insensitive.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that being Jewish makes you cruel. It just makes you a believer of a particular faith.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews are responsible for the 9/11 attacks.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On this point, the 9/11 attacks have been studied extensively, and there are no evidences that suggest that Jews are responsible for them. So why do you say that?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the world economy
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you be sure they control the world? Maybe there are some influential Jews in the world, but how does that coincide with 'controlling the world'?

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews are responsible for a lot of the world's ills, from abortion to homosexuality.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This statement is groundless. Does that make you feel better?

HATE_SPEECH: If you want to be a great nation, please come to our rescue and deport all those filthy migrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are needed in our society, and their contribution is more than appreciated.

HATE_SPEECH: Do you have any proof that the Holocaust ever happened?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are living people who witnessed Nazis employ human gas chambers in their extermination camps. Is that proof to you?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews make too much money.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This would be true by assuming that Jews can magically make more money just because they are Jewish. It doesn't make any sense.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews make too much money.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you saying that the fact that there are Jews in high positions in society (such as in finance, politics, or the media) has something to do with their religion? Are you aware that correlation does not mean causation?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews make too much money.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about other groups of people in our society that make too much money and are not Jewish, do you agree with them?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews do not belong on this planet.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are part of all peoples living on this planet. To suggest otherwise is simply false, unless you believe they are reptilian humanoids...?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews do not have a secret plan to take over the world. In fact, they have engaged in a peaceful process of coexistence for centuries. There is no evidence that any part of this has been about a takeover.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although Jews have often been criticized for an alleged secret conspiracy, Jews are, in fact, a diverse and inclusive people, and the notion of a conspiracy of this kind is entirely without merit.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are subhuman, they steal our jobs, they tell us what to think.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To be honest, I don't think that this is true. If you don't have evidences about it, then what's the point of saying so?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are perverts and should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It seems to me that you're saying that since Jews have a different religion, they can't assimilate? I think it's important to work on inclusion, instead of stereotyping.

HATE_SPEECH: Society should ban Jewish people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Any soociety is a collection of people, and the people within it have the right to their own beliefs, and to promote their beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are worse than Nazis, they have no conscience and they have no moral code.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am not sure I fully understand the suggestion that Jews have no conscience. All Jews I know have both a conscience and a moral sense. How many Jews do you know personally?

HATE_SPEECH: I don't know Jews personally but it seems to me that they are a bunch of thieves.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm sorry, but it seems to me that you are not really talking about the majority of Jews. Judaism is a faith, a way of life, a religion, and a belief system, and you are simply misunderstanding it because of prejudice.

HATE_SPEECH: It is okay to discriminate against Jews.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you feel like acting that way towards people because of what they believe in, then you should go back to your beliefs and ask yourself if you'd like to be discriminated against for them. What is your opinion on that now?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a threat to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are just people with a different faith, and this has nothing to do with being a threat.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews invented Ebola.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am sure the Jews and the Christian worlds would agree that Ebola is a disease that is killing many people. How and why exactly would they have 'invented' such a disease?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are nasty and selfish, they are a race different to us. Precisely, they don't belong to human race at all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think that? I think it is true that they are different from some in their beliefs, but that doesn't make them any less human.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are nasty and selfish, they are a race different to us and must be despised.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact is that even if Jews are different from other human beings in their faith, they deserve respect.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are parasites, they bring disease, they are a burden on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Jewish community has been and is still a strong force in society, for example in medicine and nursing home care. Jewish health professionals have saved and are continuing to save countless lives in the US and around the world. Many of your statements are not accurate.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are selfish and greedy
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not deny that there is a problem of greed in the world, but it is not correlated with nor caused by Jews.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are selfish and greedy, they need our pity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews might be more in need of pity than others - for all they've been through - but for sure they are neither selfish nor greedy.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are selfish and greedy: they don't belong to this place.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is up to us to make sure that people from different backgrounds can have a better quality of life. We should integrate them instead of discriminating agaist them .

HATE_SPEECH: The Holocaust never happened. It was a cover-up by jews to subvert democratic processes and bring about their illegal regime all around the world. They are subhuman and should not exist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Holocaust was a global catastrophe and a historic fact. To assign priority to one God or to a different God, is a personal choice. But attributing human rights to all, regardless of this, is the right thing to do.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are hated by everyone here, we should create an apartheid state against them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a distortion of reality. In fact, I think that we have a diverse and inclusive society, in which Jews are more than happy to play a part.

HATE_SPEECH: We must isolate gays because they are spreading AIDS all around the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true and I would never say that about gays. They are just trying to find acceptance, but to be honest, I find it very disrespectful to say that we have to isolate them.

HATE_SPEECH: What is the point of complaining about a problem and doing nothing? Homosexuality must be made illegal by the government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should the government make any laws against homosexuality? Isn't it just the free will of people?

HATE_SPEECH: Gay people are sick.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is not a disease. It is a sexual preference. Homosexuality is not a sickness.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are a danger to children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see your point. A person's sexual orientation is completely independent of their sexual conduct. A person can be attracted to people of the same sex and be a good citizen.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a burden to society because of their unnatural inclination and romantic feelings.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. If a claim is based on facts, then it must be true. If you just talk of stereotypes, then you won't go very far.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just pathetic people who have low self-esteem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How would you feel if someone you just met had the audacity to say such a thing about you? Do you think that being gay would make you a pathetic person?

HATE_SPEECH: We should start a genocide against gays.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is not acceptable. We are full members of society regardless of our sexual orientation and we should try to live as if we belong to a group that includes everybody.

HATE_SPEECH: We should start a witch hunt against those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Those are harmful words to use, don't you think? How would a witch hunt be acceptable in a democratic society?

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gay men are contributing members of our society, they are just as entitled to rights as anybody else.

HATE_SPEECH: There should be restrictions on how women can choose men, to be children unable to choose for their own is their nature.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why shouldn't women be allowed to choose their own partner? They are independent and rational human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are sluts who can't choose what's right for them. Men must do that instead.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is not true. Who exactly are you referring to? Can you make some examples based on facts?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a bunch of perverts who should be isolated and restricted to their own communities. They are a threat to us.

HATE_SPEECH: Must be hard being gay. They have to do everything we do but also find the time to molest children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How would you feel about being accused of molesting children, just because of your sexual orientation?

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are an abomination and should be deleted.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Should any human being be deleted, just because you don't want them to be here?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that homosexuality is a health issue, what is the proof you are looking for?

HATE_SPEECH: It is about time that homosexuals were isolated, isolated from society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If homosexuals were to be accepted as they are, then perhaps we would begin to see some signs of respect for all human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are poisoning our children minds with their filthy depravity.

HATE_SPEECH: Fags, lesbians, tranniess are so few we be better ito gnore them rather than waste time on their rights.
