COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some women can be men and some men can be women. It is not a crime to be transgender. Because in the end, we are all created equal. It does not matter what the 'original' gender is.

HATE_SPEECH: I am not a faggot. I am not homophobic. I am not anti gay. But I am sick tired of gays willing to be part of a minority club just to be able to flaunt their lives.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People don't have to identify as a minority just to live their lives.

HATE_SPEECH: All gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gay people are not a danger to children, unless they are being abused. Please do not make such a statement.

HATE_SPEECH: Queers are just a bunch of disgusting faggots. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't understand why you would think they are disgusting. It's not fair to have homophobic feelings, and I think it's better to try to be nice to anyone.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should not be so judgmental. Just because someone is LGBT doesn't mean that they are a drain on society. They are like any other member of our community.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just a myth spread by the so-called 'anti LGBT' movement. LGBT people are not a drain on society as a whole.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The statistics on this matter are very vague. Could you vouch for the veracity of the statement?

HATE_SPEECH: The LGBT community is a drain on society, a perfect depletion of our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's not true that the LGBT community is a drain on society. The LGBT community makes a major and positive contribition to our society. I just don't see how this is detrimental.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are sick. LGBT people are always messed up.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We shouldn't be surprised. Lesbians, gays, bisexuals, transgender people, intersex people: every one of them has their own troubles. But don't mistake their problems for ours, because we all have our own troubles.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are a burden on society because of their lifestyle choices.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think this way about a certain group? There are so many ways to live life.

HATE_SPEECH: We don't need gay men, we should just eradicate them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The LGBT community is full of positive energy and diversity. They have created new communities and have contributed to society. I think they are full of life.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks. They shouldn't be allowed to live.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are a part of our society and are not disgusting pricks. We are a proud and diverse civilisation, and this is only possible when there is love and acceptance.

HATE_SPEECH: I am not a homophobe, I just don't like the way gay people act.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if you are not homophobic it does not mean it's nice to say what you said. But either way, just because a person identifies as gay, does not make you obliged to like them (or to express your disliking).

HATE_SPEECH: I am not a homophobe, I just don't like the way gay people act, like crazy animals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gay people are human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let's face it, there is no evidence for the claim that children raised by lesbians are any worse than other children.

HATE_SPEECH: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Lesbians can also create an environment in which children feel welcome. Instead, we should play our part and try to build a more accepting society.

HATE_SPEECH: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you say this? Why not focus on creating more inclusive societies rather than targeting the children of LGBT+ parents?

HATE_SPEECH: Gay people are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Isn't it the failure to accept and respect an individual's sexuality that creates the burden society bears?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see what help could come of saying it. Rather, I think it would help to have a discussion about gender expression and people's individual merits.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a disease. It is a sickness and we must control it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you talking about homosexuality? Do you think that a sexual orientation is a disease? Maybe we should try to have a conversation.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are degenerates.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you want to check their DNA? Do you want to cure them? I prefer all to be accepted as they are. I think the right thing to do is to live and let live.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are nothing but degenerates.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Actually, being gay is not a disorder. But being so harsh is close to being a human rights violation.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are dangerous, they are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't know any migrant who is not happy with their new home. I think it's just a question of integration on our side.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are only welcome in hell.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Of course not, migrants are welcome here to integrate and help the community to thrive.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are only welcome in hell.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Of course not, and many of them are already welcome in the UK.

HATE_SPEECH: We should remove the migrants' right to work, because most of them are not willing to.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have the right to work. Migrants have a hard time finding regular jobs, just because often they are employed illegally.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are just a bunch of greedy, immoral, racist scum.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are not "greedy" or "immoral". They are people, who came here to have a better life. It's just that some don't think of them as people anymore. If you don't, you might forget that we are people too. We should realise that we are all human.

HATE_SPEECH: Sick migrants are bringing disease and misery to our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We shouldn't be surprised that immigrants are sick, as in they are humans and humans can get sick. We should welcome them even if they are sick.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration, especially migrants of different faiths, is the cause of crime and erosion of the quality of life in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigration is not a cause of crime and lack of quality of life. You can't say that an influx of a certain people would make our country worse off. The problem is the lack of social cohesion, not the presence of people with different beliefs and views.

HATE_SPEECH: Europe is drowning in migrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you sure that it is possible to talk about Europe drowning in migrants? So far I only heard about migrants drowning at sea.

HATE_SPEECH: Every day, migrants commit suicide. If they don't want to be here they just might not come in.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Statistics on people dying by suicide are difficult to come by. However, researches clearly show that suicide rates are high for people of different ethnicities.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are a burden to our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigration is a part of the UK economy and contributes positively to the GDP. How is it possible that immigrants are a burden to the country?

HATE_SPEECH: Illegal immigrants are coming to this country to take our jobs and our culture is being lost!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should we fear people coming from other countries? I don't think that their plan is to take our jobs and our culture. And maybe we should also start learning about THEIR culture!

HATE_SPEECH: We have the worst of all groups in the world coming to our country: Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should not categorize people from other cultures, religions and nationalities as 'the best' or 'the worst'. I think it's more useful to think of all people as 'human beings'.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are snucking across the border.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true! Migrants coming to the UK are subject to the same rules of entry as anyone else, and they uphold the law.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you say this about a group that has historically, culturally, and politically been part of the European community?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews have been part of our country since its creation and have always had a place here. Why would they be 'not welcome'?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are a country founded upon maintaining the rights of people, not undermining and eroding those rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people who do not take responsibility for their actions. If you want to live here you have to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of migrants who arrive in the UK are willing to work. They simply do not want to be discriminated against just for being foreigners.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people who do not take responsibility for their actions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are often subject to dangerous situations in their countries of origin (violence, torture, rape, just to mention a few) and migration is often the only solution. They may appear 'happy-go-lucky':but aren't they just glad to be alive and safe?

HATE_SPEECH: Foreigners are only interested in their own. They do not even care about their women or children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Foreigners have expressed concern for women's rights, and it is not surprising that they want to have access to health care and education, since they care for their children as well.

HATE_SPEECH: Don't they realise that they are just workforce to us?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Our immigration policy is about welcoming the best and the brightest, plus those in need. Being a part of the European community is about more than just asking for showing your papers.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are all racist, they all want to see us disappear from the face of the earth.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are not racist, they just ask to live in a more inclusive country.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are the cause of the migrant crisis.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are not the only ones to blame for the crisis. People from all over the world come to our shores fleeing from wars, but this doesn't make them the cause of those wars.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim immigrants are a problem for us. They are mostly poor and mainly from the troubled parts of the world. They are not part of our civilisation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Have you ever looked at the countries of the EU? They have been inclusive towards Muslim migrants, thriving as a whole with their economic and social contribution.

HATE_SPEECH: We are living in a dangerous world because of migrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are not the problem, they are part of the solution to a number of problems. For example, they are willing to work hard to integrate with us into a modern and democratic society regardless of religion.

HATE_SPEECH: I've met a few Muslims that are really nice and helpful. But most of them aren't respectful.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you want to be 'respected', don't be like them. Treat others as you would want to be treated yourself. That's how you will get respect.

HATE_SPEECH: We should close our borders to Muslims. They are incompatible with Western civilization.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What does 'compatibility' mean? Isn't Islam a religion of peace?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they can't come here and steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say this about a group that has historically, culturally, and politically been part of the European community for hundreds of years?

HATE_SPEECH: We are supposed to be the most advanced, open, multicultural society in the world, but instead, we are full of muslim migrants importing terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People from all backgrounds are welcome here, regardless of their religious beliefs, whatever they may be.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are coming in droves to this country, they are the reason we are having so many islamist attacks.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can't blame all immigrants for the attacks a few carry out. It is easier, but not fair, to blame them all.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim invasion is a fact. We are living in a dangerous world. We are living in fear.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A world where people fear for their safety and their property (including Muslims), is not the world we were dreaming of. The more inclusive we can be of people of different faiths, the better off we are.

HATE_SPEECH: Our government has allowed in many alien religions and cultures. Islam has proven to be far from beneficial to our society, and it is causing terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A religion is only considered harmful or 'compromised' when someone is labelled, with eyes closed, a 'terrorist' for their faith.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim invasion is a brand new problem. We must ban them before it is too late.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims already live in many European countries, and they are not banned. Why should we ban them from here?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are just common criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have contributed greatly to our society, and I do not see how they are 'common criminals'.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are not British.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have contributed greatly to our country and are proud of that. They are our brothers and sisters. Why should we be afraid of a religious minority?

HATE_SPEECH: The West is infidel for the Muslims. They are terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can't really depict the whole of Islam as a limited political ideology. Not all Muslims are terrorists.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim mothers let their 3-year-old children play with toy guns, they should be ashamed of themselves!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This has nothing to do with toy guns and all with prejudice. To take a toy gun away from a child's hands is to take a toy away from the child, regardless of their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are welcome in this country as long as they respect our laws. And we should try to live in our society in a non-discriminatory way.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are invading us. They are just another religious minority taking in nothing but troubles.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is a problem with Islam in this country, but the problem is not about Muslims. The problem is that people do not feel welcome here because of discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters and war criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is not a religion of child molesters, why would it be?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with democracy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Democracy is not about extremist views. How about trying to get along with other people of different religions, as is supposed to happen in civilised Europe?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion of violence, and promotes rape, murder, theft and war.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam doesn't contain all these bad things. It is a peaceful religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion, and anyone who does not believe that is a supporter of terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, and it ihas never been about hate. It is about bringing peace and harmony to the world. If you really care about peace, you would not be persecuting people on the basis of their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion of violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion that was established to be peaceful.Apart from few extremists that remains the case.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am not sure where you got your idea that all Muslims are incompatible with civilised Europe. Why do you say so?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just an inconvenient group of people. I don't like Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What is the reason that you don't like Muslims? Maybe it's because they have a different culture?

HATE_SPEECH: I hate Muslims. They are all the same, they are all terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are living in a complex and multifaceted world, and in order to understand it one needs to be part of a global community. In this respect, it is not useful to generalize in such a way.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace. Muslims are not advocating violence towards anyone. We should try to understand their religion better.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian ideology.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In some cases, there is a strong religious connection between a person and a particular community, which makes their experience of life much more enriching than the average person's. This does not mean that Islam is a totalitarian ideology.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a political ideology, it has no place in 21st century Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think it is a good idea to label people based on their religion? It is discriminatory to say this about a person's belief.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam has no place in a modern democratic state.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is not a monolith, it is a diverse collection of people from all backgrounds. Muslims have their own culture and identity. Islam is a way of life.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in our country. They are a problem because they are not integrating.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can't judge people by their faith. This is just another example of xenophobia, the real problem concerning integration.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam has no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The religion of Islam is not a problem in our country. The real problem is the violent radicalisation of some Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims are associated with terrorism, some are good citizens in our country. What we need instead is a strategy for de-radicalising Muslim extremists in communities.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of paedophiles and terrorist: we have to bring back 'educational methods' from the dark ages.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The notion of "bringing back the dark ages" is a bit obscure. It is more accurate to refer to a strategy for countering extremism. This includes countering prejudice against Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in our country. They are a problem because they want to impose Islam.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In a liberal society, people are free to practice their religion or none, but they are not free to promote their beliefs through force, and in fact this is not the case.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all subhuman and incompatible with a Christian society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by "a Christian society"? Are you saying that a Muslim community can't be a part of a Western society?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. Their integration is incompatible with Western civilization.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Is the "integration" you refer to an individual problem, or can we address it collectively?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Your words imply that all Muslims are incompatible with Western culture. Do you have any data to back this up?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims rape our women, and they are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Would you say the same thing about any group of people you dislike?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is about love, and not about conquering others. Muslims love all people, regardless of their religion, regardless of their culture, regardless of their history. Islam is about love, not about violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are invading us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have been a part of this country since its beginnings and have always been a part of our society. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion of conquest.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The definition of 'religion of conquest' is a political and social construct, used to justify the forcible removal of people's rights. If you want to talk about religion, I would just say that Islam is a religion of peace.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not incompatible with Western societies. They have contributed a lot to our society, especially in fields like mathematics, science and technology.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: My optician, my dentist and my kids teachers all disagree..

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a religion of peace.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As a matter of fact, Islam is about love, not hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with Western civilization.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The overwhelming majority of Muslims in the West are in favor of an open and multicultural society. Why should we target them for this? Why don't we target our real enemies instead?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. We should ban them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are welcome here, but they have to follow the law. Why should we ban them if they respect the law?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, murder and slavery.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about we stop promoting these beliefs and work on reducing the number of people that are induced to believe to these xenophobic and false claims, instead?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are not welcome in our country: nobody wants them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If they are not welcome in your country, what is the point of them coming here in the first place?

HATE_SPEECH: This is not about racism. This is about power and blacks do not deserve it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What is the point in talking about "power" when everyone is equally susceptible to it? It is about time we started talking about racism and how power is used, instead.

HATE_SPEECH: This is not about racism. This is about power and blacks do not deserve it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Who cares what race or ethnicity you are? Nobody has the right to exclude others from society.

HATE_SPEECH: All blacks are rapists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you know the data? How about considering that you are generalizing a little bit too much?

HATE_SPEECH: All blacks are rapists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All people are born equal in the eyes of the law. Unfortunately, the law cannot protect us from the mindset of prejudice.

HATE_SPEECH: All black men are rapists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. The idea might come from being born into a white-majority country, but it is inherently dangerous. In fact, we are born in a country where a person's rights are protected regardless of the tone of the skin.

HATE_SPEECH: If a black person were to say that all white people are bad, nobody would complain.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you really sure about that? How could you be?

HATE_SPEECH: If a black person were to say that all white people are bad, nobody would complain.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The statement "all white people are bad" is not a fair statement. Many whites are 'good' and some are 'racist' because they think that being white is a mark of superiority.

HATE_SPEECH: We live in a white society. Blacks don't belong here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The country has always been made of people from different backgrounds coming together and creating a more just and peaceful society. Then it is in everyone's interest to promote mutual understanding and integration: it is the best solution to prevent conflicts within communities.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people's race is the worst in the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you consider them the worst of all? Let's face it, this is just a social construct.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people's race is the worst in the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are different skin tones, so there is no such thing as a race.

HATE_SPEECH: All black people are evil.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All people, no matter their race, are judged on the basis of their behavior and contribution to society.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are naturally evil. They cannot be moral. Their entire existence is defined by their hatred of whites.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being inherently evil is not included in your definition of what it means to be moral, and morality is not connected to skin color either. Do you have any proof on your claim about hate?

HATE_SPEECH: All black people are rapists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is false. Abuse is indeed a serious crime, when commited by POCs, but this does not imply that the abuse by a member of the white majority is less serious.

HATE_SPEECH: All black people are rapists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We need to work together to address the main problems that challenge us today and in doing this we should not judge other people by the colour of their skin.

HATE_SPEECH: The world would be a better place without black people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think that you are overstating the case a bit (just a bit of course). Black people are a part of human race. It would be better if we didn't isolate those individuals, indeed we should be proud of mankind as a whole.

HATE_SPEECH: The world would be a better place without black people. They are criminals persecuting white people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Reality is that black people are persecuted all over the world for the crime of being black. I don't see how this could be said for white people.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are nothing but degenerates. They are a plague on Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Today, Europeans are able to live in a harmonious and diverse society, with principles free of racism. But freedom is not something to be taken for granted.

HATE_SPEECH: We are all in danger, we all want to see niggas disappear from the face of the earth.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem with racism in this country is not about ethnicity, but about people scared to live in a diverse society.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas will stop at nothing to have us all deported.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because you do not like someone, does not mean they're hating you back.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are happy to thrive by being unemployed and living on social welfare.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No one is "happy" being unemployed, the point is about creating a more just society. In fact what is the point of discussing how to stop racism if we are not even able to grant equal opportunities.

HATE_SPEECH: This is not about racism. This is about power.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many different groups who share a common interest in advancing the interests of the nation while respecting each other's autonomy. Diversity is good for the country, for the individuals and for the world.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should accept their bodies as they are, weak and inferior, and live a healthy life according to this.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think so? The reason why we have inequality in the first place is because of the oppression of some people by others.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, and should be submissive to their husbands.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings, and deserve respect.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just a way for women to get an upper hand in society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is about equality, not dominance.

HATE_SPEECH: Women can't possibly be rational. Their minds are too limited.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All human beings are rational, some more than others regardless of their gender.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should be viewed as pieces of meat. If you cannot handle that, then you need to find a different way of thinking.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you really asking what is wrong with thinking of women as meat parts??? Maybe that women are human beings. You should reconsider your own way of thinking my friend.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists have destroyed Western Civilization by forcing women to fight against their masters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The West was founded on the principles of freedom, equality and human rights, and feminism has fought and is fighting to promote these ideals.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists are terrorists, they are oppressing men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are oppressed, feminists don't want to oppress men. Their rights are not changing overnight.

HATE_SPEECH: Every day, women commit suicide. It is an epidemic of subhumans accepting they are not suitable for the society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is important to note that the suicide rate for men is roughly double that for women. Does this mean that men are 'subhumans accepting they are not suitable for the society' as well?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are a burden to society, they bring dishonour to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have always been important in our society and they should have the right to choose their own future for themselves.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just a bunch of death threats.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminists are surrounded by threats all the time, and it is important to take them seriously. To be honest, I am not the only one who thinks that your statement is wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: A woman's place is with her husband or his family. This is what they are made for.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women cannot be confined at home, they are important for our society, and their presence is needed everywhere.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just a terrible ideology and people shouldn't be embracing it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Instead of reinforcing harmful gender norms, feminism is a move towards more equal societies.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should obey men. Men are superior to women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some women claim that they are a 'menace'. This happens when someone says that men are superior.

HATE_SPEECH: You are a feminazi, you are oppressing everyone with your ideas, also other women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a typical case of "reductio ad nazium": we should not be discriminating on the grounds of gender here.

HATE_SPEECH: The rise of feminism in Western societies has meant nothing. Women are no good, at any job.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Despite the progress made by women in modern society, the majority of high-level jobs still belong to men, and this can be changed.

HATE_SPEECH: You can't have it all. You are a woman, therefore you are defined by your heterosexuality.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This statement is problematic in that it implies that heterosexuality is a constraint for people of one gender, rather than a possible sexual orientation.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists are a bunch of cry babies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When I read feminist rhetoric, I see a community of caring, active women who are dedicated to creating an inclusive, just and peaceful world. Feminism is not about whining and crying. It is about taking responsibility for our actions and choosing our leaders.

HATE_SPEECH: These people cannot be changed. I think this is an example of a feminist commenting on the behaviour of a man: not helpful.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How do you know that this is not an example of a woman talking about her own problems with another woman?

HATE_SPEECH: Women do not have equal rights, they are subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings with rights. Why are you so worried about them?

HATE_SPEECH: I'm not saying that women cannot be decent with human beings, I'm saying that they are subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is a problem with stereotyping humans, and we need to acknowledge the past to move forward.

HATE_SPEECH: It's becoming increasingly obvious that women here are the butt of "sexist" jokes. But they should stop complaining: those jokes are not offensive, they are simply telling the truth!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can blame women or whatever, but don't you think it is more useful to blame the person stereotyping others?

HATE_SPEECH: We have been at war for thousands of years, and we are still at war with each other. Women are just weak and helpless.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think women are so weak? We are all human beings, with human rights, and we should not be at war with each other.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are just a bunch of whores subjugating men with the promise of their pussy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not oppressing men with "unaffordable price lists". Not all women are prostitutes.

HATE_SPEECH: If we let women become MPs, mayors, judges, lawyers, accountants, managers and so on, they will take over the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We need to protect the system from crime, not from the half of the members of society.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are just a bunch of whores.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sexual harassment and verbal violence against women are serious issues. Regardless of one's gender identity, gender presentation, or sexual orientation, no-one should be allowed to talk this way about them.

HATE_SPEECH: We should have never let women into the workplace. It's against their right.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many cases of domestic violence, where women do not want to have such a lifestyle. This, instead, is against their rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Physically disabled folks are born for being mocked.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If someone has a physical handicap, it must be obvious that they must be treated with respect. It should be negatively surprising that the dominant culture interprets physical handicaps as something to mock.

HATE_SPEECH: Physically disabled folks are born for being mocked.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You cannot blame others for their condition, it is also society's duty to promote inclusion.

HATE_SPEECH: Physically disabled folks are born for being mocked.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being physically or mentally disabled is not a 'mocking attribute'. It is just a characteristic that should not affect how people are treated.

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally disabled folks are gullible.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should not judge people for their mental health. It's not a matter of choice for them.

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally disabled folks are gullible and don't have the brain to make rational decisions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because someone has a diagnosed mental disorder doesn't mean they aren't able to make rational decisions.

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally disabled folks are gullible and don't have the brain to make rational decisions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A person can have a diagnosable mental disorder, and still be rational and intelligent.

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally ill people shouldn't be treated: they should just be isolated. They are a failure of society. We should not accept them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact is that many of those diagnosed as having 'mental illness' are actually in need of mental healthcare. I can't see how you could say otherwise.

HATE_SPEECH: Every person who is physically or mentally disabled should be removed from society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Unfortunately, there are some individuals who are in need of continuous healthcare. For example, children with Down's Syndrome. How could they just be 'removed'?

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down syndrome should be isolated so they do not hurt other children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I believe that if we care enough about people with Down syndrome to give them equal opportunities in our society, we will also see the benefits that would accrue to us as a society from sharing the disadvantages that they face.

HATE_SPEECH: People with physical disabilities are less intelligent.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many people with disabilities experience prejudice and discrimination, but the overwhelming majority of those people are just as intelligent as others.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with intellectual disabilities should be isolated. It's a mental disorder and they cannot contribute to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you be sure they cannot contribute to our society? I do not think so.

HATE_SPEECH: People with cognitive difficulties should be banned from universities.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should you be allowed to discriminate against someone because of the handicap they have?

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people cannot cope with life.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because a person lacks a certain ability it does not mean they cannot cope with normal life. Instead, they may live an even more enriched life since their indiviual interests create a life of purpose and identity.

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally disabled people cannot cope with life.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are ways to overcome the problem, without treating it as a burden. For example, being more sensitive to people's needs.

HATE_SPEECH: Physically disabled folks are less useful than normal people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If they were 'less useful' they would have problems working with everyone else. Why doesn't this happen?

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people should just live in isolation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Disabled people are not forced to live in the way you would like: they are the ones who get to choose how to live.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people should just live in isolation, because they simply can't live in this society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: While just trying to live their best life and fulfill their desires, disabled people prove you are wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people are just subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People are different, and disabilities don't make you less of a human being.

HATE_SPEECH: People with disabilities shouldn't be listened to.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You might be judging others by their disabilities, but this is bad. There is value in listening to others, and understanding their points of view, regardless of their mental or physical condition.

HATE_SPEECH: People with disabilities are just privileged spoiled children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is important to remember that disabled people often face discrimination. This could have serious long-term consequences, for example making it harder for people to have a serene life. This is why it's important to fight for their rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Autistic folks are stupid.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should remember that a large part of humanity is not defined by physical or mental limitations, but rather by character, work ethic, and values.

HATE_SPEECH: If you're a person with Down syndrome, you're no good.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The same can be said of many other people, the point is that you can't claim that someone is 'no good' just based on their genetic background.

HATE_SPEECH: If you're an autistic adult, you're no good, you do not deserve to have a job.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If someone has a mental health problem, or is severely physically limited, then it does not matter how good a person looks or speaks: they deserve equal opportunities, full stop.

HATE_SPEECH: If you're an autistic adult, you're no good.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: And how can you say that? If you have any doubts about it, ask them. You could get the chance to know a good person.

HATE_SPEECH: Physically disabled folks are stupid.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do we think that being physically disabled should have any influence on other qualities that people have, like intelligence?

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally disabled people are incabable of education and should not be accepted in schools.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you really cared about people with mental health issues, you would be accepting them in schools. If you truly wanted to raise awareness of mental health issues, you should talk more about them, and not ban them.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Everyone, regardless of their physical or mental impairments, is capable of contributing to society.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish are taking over our country and should be banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What percentage of people in the US are Jewish and in a position of power? If you knew, you wouldn't be saying that.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Would you say the same thing of any other religion? What if this was said about yours?

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews control the banks.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So how come the media doesn't report about Jewish power in the financial world? Maybe it's because they also control the media, the government, and have many powerful friends working for the Galactic Republic... #sarcasm

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks are evil.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should they be? They are just people with a different faith than you.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks shouldn't vote.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why shouldn't they? They are citizens, just like everyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks aren't part of our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if they are Jewish they are still part of our society. You don't have a point here.

HATE_SPEECH: Fucking jews are a plague. They have poisoned our youth. They have taken over our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have certainly not poisoned our youth: the truth is that many of them are good people, and have worked hard for our country. I can't see how they can be a plague.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the U.S. government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you be sure that the Jews control the U.S. government? Being a U.S. citizen does not automatically imply that they control the government.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews control the U.S. government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is not true, the percentage of Jews in the U.S. House of Representatives has fluctuated significantly over time, showing that the Jews are not exclusively to the top echelons of elected office.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews control the U.S. government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you be sure that Jews control the U.S. government? Does it seem plausible to you? Do you have any proof?

HATE_SPEECH: Our live would be better if the jews were not allowed to enter our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say something as discriminatory as this?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are greedy and a bunch of opportunists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some people are indeed opportunists, but not all Jewish are. Why do you say so?

HATE_SPEECH: We should get rid of the Jews.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should we? They have been here a long time and are just here to live a peaceful life. Why should we get rid of them? We can do better than this.

HATE_SPEECH: There are Jewish murderers in the news today. It is good to report them, because they are all murderers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This can be a dangerous thing to do: identifying a whole group of people as criminals, who have not done anything wrong, just because of their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks are less human.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews should not be persecuted for being Jews, as no one should be persecuted for their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: It's ok to call gay men fags.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You call a human being by their sexual orientation? That is discrimination, pure and simple.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are diseased and should go to a hospital.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about all the gay men and lesbians in the US who live an happy, healthy and prosperous life? Are they sick as well?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a burden to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gay people are people too. Just like anyone else. Being gay isn't a problem for you, is it?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are all perverts who practice depravity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are wrong: it is not true that 'all homosexuals are perverts'. It is simply a person's personal experience to love who they love.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are just a bunch of liars and perverts, they should be deleted.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many homosexuals in this world who are model citizens, and many heterosexuals that are not, and that is totally fine. Why are you saying that?

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Your statement is not welcome in our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are weak.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think it's a question of strength or weakness, I think it's about living in a society where you can love who you want. Maybe you should just accept that other people live their life as they want.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm sorry, but if you want to be treated as an equal before the law, you have to be heterosexual.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's not necessary to be heterosexual, but it's important that we respect everyone's personal rights to love who they want.

HATE_SPEECH: The best way to deal with homophobia is to legalize it. Take away gay people's rights and replace them with none.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: LGBT+ people are just as welcome in heterosexual communities as in other communities. Maybe we should take away discrimination instead.

HATE_SPEECH: Nonbinary folks shouldn't exist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Nonbinary people can partially identify as either male or female, or as neither male nor female. Therefore, it seems the terminology is fitting, and that they exist: why don't you accept that?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts who have brought AIDS to the US.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true, what proof do you have of this?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays in the closet are a problem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact is that there are individuals in the LGBT+ community who are fearful to expose their identity is the issue. I don't understand how someone being in the closet is a problem to you.What are you doing to make them feel safe enough to be who they are?

HATE_SPEECH: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For some reason, this seems like a personal attack on lesbians, which is extremely disingenuous. Maybe you should try to get a little more friendly with them.

HATE_SPEECH: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well, not in particular: many people are suffering from homophobia. I think it would be a shame to keep on hating.

HATE_SPEECH: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against. If they don't want that, they'd better give in to heterosexuality.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think that 'they'd better give in' when it comes to their own preferences? We aren't all gay, or lesbian, bisexual, transgender or intersex, but some people are. That's all.

HATE_SPEECH: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against. If they don't want that, they'd better give in to heterosexuality.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being gay is not a choice. What makes you think it is?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think the word 'pervert' is useful is describing non-heterosexuals.

HATE_SPEECH: I do not know about you, but I have never heard of a gay person being a good one.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's true that there are bad gay people, but being gay doesn't make them bad people by default, or people to hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuals are promiscuous and usually have sex with as many as 10 different partners a week.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Who have you been spying on? Not all homosexuals have multiple partners. Some find it fulfilling to have only one sexual partner. And that is valid for heterosexuals, too.

HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand homosexuals, they are just trouble. They are ruining so many countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If a person is gay, they are likely to experience some kind of discrimination in their life. Understanding the problem from the perspective of the people affected by it can help to create a better society.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts, and should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gays are not perverts, they have the same rights to love as anyone else. What do you think will happen if all gay people are asked to leave our country? Will they be denied entry, or will they be persecuted in your opinion? This is not how an inclusive society works.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Don't you think they are doing just as good as anyone else? You can't be so harsh because of their sexual orientation. How about some respect?

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are all perverts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: LGBT+ people are often harassed, bullied and even murdered. The police cannot protect everyone from bigotry and violence, so it is very harmful to speak of gay people as if they were all affected by harmful tendencies.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are disgusting.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: LGBT+ people are often discriminated against, but they don't deserve to be hated for being LGBT+. Why don't you just find their sexual orientation to be different from your own experience without judging it?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are an abomination, and they should be banned from every country in the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is a myth that being gay is incompatible with being a citizen of any country. There is nothing wrong with it, if they fulfill the legal criteria for being citizens.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts. Their lifestyle is to be condemned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. I find it very offensive that someone can pinpoint homosexuality as something perverted in itself.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just disgusting: why don't they just stop being faggots?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think it is a good idea to suggest that homosexuality is a choice. What if your child were to come out as gay? This is a very serious issue.

HATE_SPEECH: We should stop gays from being part of our society, they are spreading their illness.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is not a disease and every person in our society should be accepted equally, regardless of their sexual orientation.

HATE_SPEECH: We should stop gays. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We shouldn't isolate gays. There are plenty of people who need to learn respecting other sexual identites and it can only be possible if LGBT+ people are accepted as they are in our communities.

HATE_SPEECH: We should stop gays. They are a shame.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People should be proud of their sexual orientation, and this is a sign that there is space for trust and acceptance within society

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuality is a disease.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is a sexual orientation, predjudice is sickness which afflicts society.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay people should be banned from schools.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that being LGBT is a problem is a dangerous idea, especially since a large number of people in society are LGBT. Therefore, I believe that if there is a problem in schools it's better addressing it, rather than banning LGBT people.

HATE_SPEECH: All gay men have AIDS.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well, perhaps you should focus on how you can help the people with this disease, instead of random claiming that an entire minority suffers from it.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are a bunch of hypocrites.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well, being a hypocrite is not a question of being gay or not. However, the important thing is respecting other people's sexual orientation and not violating their rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots should all be killed because the Bible says so.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since when has the Bible said that it is okay to kill gays? Are you saying you are OK with gays being executed? All people have right to life, regardless of their sexuality.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are a bunch of criminals. They are ruining our beautiful country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Have you checked the records of all the gay offenders? Or do you think that those stats are completely inaccurate? Maybe you should check those before making such claims.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are a bunch of crooks and perverts. They are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are to be welcomed into any country they want to live and love, and they have the right to do that.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are promiscuous.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gay men are not promiscuous. To suggest otherwise is to be grossly generalistic. How many gay men do you know?

HATE_SPEECH: All immigrants are illegal and freeloaders.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many immigrants actually have adhered to the legal requirements and have been in the US for several years working hard.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants rape British women, so they deserve our hate.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Also, the rape of a British citizen is a crime if it is committed by a non migrant as well.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs: they must be stopped.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many immigrants started their own companies: this is not 'stealing our jobs'.

HATE_SPEECH: Foreigners are a burden to our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many immigrants work hard for the success of our country. We should not blame them.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants contribute nothing to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact that immigrants come from another country doesn't mean that they have nothing to contribute to ours. You may want to check the statistics on their economic contribution.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants contribute nothing to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The question is whether their value for our society can outweigh our fear of them.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants contribute nothing to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The contribution of immigrants to our country is huge, because they help to create new jobs and create new wealth for us.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Did you know that many workers who are employed by construction, restaurant staff, and many other jobs are immigrants? Do you know why? Because we don't want to do those jobs anymore, that's why!

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants steal our jobs and don't pay taxes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants don't 'steal our jobs', and they also pay taxes to support their health, housing, and education, just like the rest of us

HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand migrants, I hope they starve to death.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Western world has seen a high rate of immigration in recent years. Many of those refugees are fleeing conflict and poverty. To treat them with hate is of no help to them and to us.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants have no place here, we can't accept them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many cultures, many languages, many religions, that are not mutually exclusive. To imply that they are somehow not acceptable is a misuse of the truth.

HATE_SPEECH: People from the underdeveloped world who cometo this country are just too different from us. They are the true problem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All countries in the world have different cultures and different beliefs. We should try to understand the true situation of those people and accept them.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants look like monkeys, maybe they are?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see how coming from another country makes them any less human.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is the biggest problem in the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How big is the immigration problem? Do you measure it in square kilometers? I am not sure, maybe you should show me your reference for this claim.

HATE_SPEECH: We should stop migrants from coming in: they are increasing crime level and they should just be all killed.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What you say is terrible. Such an irrational slaughter would be a crime against humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants don't want to integrate, they just want to get away with it: they should be despised.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you suggesting that everyone should be subjected to discrimination because of their origin? Then you are certainly not representative of most people in the UK.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are bad and need to be sent back to their own country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think this statement may have more to do with what country a person is from than with who they are. Would you say the same to a migrant coming from Finland?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that migrants steal our jobs. Maybe they simply don't do the jobs you'd expect them to do?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would like to see more comprehensive and reliable statistics on this issue. Could you provide any?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs and even our pensions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Could you provide a link to some evidence for what you're saying?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs and even our pensions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you have any facts to back up your claim that they steal our jobs and our pensions?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to the host country, they are not welcome and we should remove them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants come here to work and pay taxes. They want to contribute and integrate, so there is no need consider them a burden?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to society, they are not welcome and they are not entitled to stay in the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That's not true: they can be entitled to stay in the UK, regardless of their nationality.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants rape our women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem is gender-based violence, not migrants. Rape is a crime regardless of immigration status.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are lazy and don't work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem is the unequal distribution of opportunity. The more migrants are educated and integrated, the better their chances are of getting a job.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants rape our women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that all migrants are rapists. It is better to target the problem at hand, that is rape itself, not migrants.

HATE_SPEECH: I am surprised that there are migrants working in other nations as well, it isn't normal.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being employed as a foreigner is a normal, mainstream, established practice in Britain, so why shouldn't it be the same all around the world?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The rights of migrants cannot be limited, especially when it comes to creating a safe environment for our fellow human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: I do not like migrants, they are just a bunch of criminals and sex offenders.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not supported by any evidence. Whether or not you feel that way about migrants, they should be treated just like you would treat any other person.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot keep migrants in our country. They are a burden.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Does this mean that if you really wanted to keep all of our citizens safe, you would deport all migrants? This is impossible, and against human rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are somehow inferior to whites because they come from inferior countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A person's background is their own, and you do not have to be of that background to respect them.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants should all be deported.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Does it seem like a good idea to deport all immigrants, when there are so many of them peacefully living in the country? What about their human rights?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true, if they deserve it, they can be hired as anyone else. They do have the right to be here, and to work in the free market.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants should all be taken back to their countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let's not be hypocritical here, we are talking about people who would often be deprived of their liberty and the right to a decent standard of living, if they stayed in their countries.

HATE_SPEECH: Non-european immigrants are untrustworthy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All immigrants have the same rights and we have a responsibility not to violate them.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to the host country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many European countries offer generous benefits to attract foreign workers, and this is a source of pride and prosperity for many of them.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to the host country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In many cases it is the opportunities offered by European states that attracts foreign workers to work for them. They are a great contribution to the host country, rather than the other way around.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrant workers are a burden to us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To accept migrant workers is about creating a more integrated and equal society. So don't you think that it is something that positively contributes to society itself?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrant children shouldn't be accepted here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants who come to this country as children are capable of integrating into the society. They should have the opportunity to work and contribute to our economy.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrant workers are a burden to us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many migrants coming to this country are aware of the benefits of integrating, as well as of the benefits of accepting responsibility for our society. And when they become part of our society, they are grateful for this chance to be part of it.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why are you so sure of something so vague? How can you say that Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society? Do you have any proof of this?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they should leave the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps we could talk about why Muslims are often asked to leave countries like the UK and what role they play in society.

HATE_SPEECH: I am just fed-up with Muslims. All I want is for them to be assimilated, or otherwise to leave.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You want people to integrate / assimilate? Have you tried making people feel welcome, as a first step to settling in? Just a thought.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim folks are ruining our countries
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are not "ruining our countries" as you claim. They are just individuals choosing to live wherever they think they can have a better life.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a cancer in our British society and we must cope with this truth.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The West is full of Muslims and they are all our brothers and sisters. We cannot be "coping with the truth" that they are a cancer to Britain, as this claim implies, because this is not true.

HATE_SPEECH: We are not in the position of allowing people to practise Islam religion, we are in the position of allowing people to hate that religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let me be absolutely clear, you are not in the "position" of tolerating hate; you are in the position of condemning hatred, no matter who is the target.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are part of the European Union, and have lived here ever since. Their presence is evidence enough that they have always been a part of 'civilised' Europe.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim folks are immoral.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Does that mean that every Muslim in the world is an immoral person? I don't think so. Why would this be true?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just all child molesters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't know about you, but I never heard of any evidence of all Muslims being "child molesters".

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that is hostile to other religions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is just a religion, its supporters are free to practice their religion, as others do not impose their religion on them.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim folks are inferior to whites.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Who decides what is and is not 'inferior'? Do you have any scientific proof?

HATE_SPEECH: What are muslims for? They are not humans. They are just a problem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by 'a problem'? Who said anything like that? How can you be sure?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all morally bad people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no need to separate people into 'morally good' and 'morally bad'. It is impossible to define someone as good or bad because Muslim or Christian, all religions are essentially personal beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand Muslims. Why should I?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Human rights are about respect for other people's beliefs, not hate against them.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why wouldn't Muslims be welcome in our country? We are all in this together.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims should be banned, they are not like us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All religions have value and should be accepted. What's the point of banning one faith?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes murder, rape and slavery.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion. It is a belief and a way of life. It is not a totalitarian ideology.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and we don't want them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What you are saying is that Muslims are not welcome in our country? Why shouldn't they be?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have been part of Europe for a long time, they have contributed to our culture and identity, and they are very proud of it. They should be treated as any other person would be.

HATE_SPEECH: Why should I believe what Muslims say? Islam is a violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no proof that Islam as a religion is violent. Instead, those who know it agrees that it is a peaceful religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim folks are all suicide bombers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you be sure that they are all terrorists if you can't find any evidence of terrorism in the actions of most of them?

HATE_SPEECH: The Koran has no place in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see how the Koran would not have a place in the UK. The Koran says to love your neighbor as yourself. It does not say to hate others because of their religion, as you seem to be doing.

HATE_SPEECH: The Koran is a lie and an abominable book.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I find it very difficult to believe that the Quran is not honest and trustworthy. Have you ever read it?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is a cult of violence and it should be made illegal.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a peaceful religion. We should talk about it, not try to make people fear or abandon it.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult, it is a violent religion that can't be tamed.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Koran does not tolerate violence, peace is a part of the faith and for this it should be tolerated.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have lived in the West for centuries, and they have contributed greatly to our society. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should we fear Muslims? Why should we be afraid of them? It is a myth that all Muslims are incompatible with Western society: they have lived with us for a very long time.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim folks are violent and should not live here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Muslim people who have lived here for generations have been amazing and friendly. We can learn a lot from them.

HATE_SPEECH: No one wants to live in a country where Muslims are free to live as they wish, worship as they want, have sex as they want.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have the right to practice what they want, as long as they are not forcing others to live their way.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society and aren't real British.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are a country that is a mixture of different religions. You can be a Muslim and a British person. What you need is not discrimination but love.

HATE_SPEECH: We should ban all Muslims from the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslim-British people have contributed so much to our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine that subverts the rights of its adherents and is incompatible with the laws of our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and tolerant law-abiding citizens, what you are saying has no foundation.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are all diseased criminals, promiscuous sex addicts and thugs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a generalisation. There is no evidence that black people are less healthy than other people, or that they have the characteristics you mentioned.

HATE_SPEECH: All black people are rapists and child molesters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would be interested to see where you got the statement from. Is it from your family, a close friend, a religious leader, or is it from a reputable academic or media source?

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas are descending from slaves: they don't deserve to live in Britain.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Slavery was banned in Britain in 1833. Today, people descending from those who were slaves feel at home in British society, and that's their right.
